2946:8: vyākhyānādācāryapāramparyopadeśātsandehe'pi viśeṣāvagamo bhavati na tu lakṣaṇābhāva iti |
2946:9: tena ṣaṣṭho sthāneyogenetyasya pratyākhyāne ṣaṣṭhonirdeśeṣvanekasaṁbandhasaṁbhave'pi sthāneyogaiva bhavati |
2946:10: taduktaṁ “vyākhyānato viśeṣapratipattirna hi sandehādalakṣaṇamiti sthāneyogeti vyākhyāsyāma”iti ||
2946:15: tatra ke'ṇaḥ dralopeṁ pūrvasya dīrgho'ṇa ityatrāṇagrahaṇasāmarthādavasīyate pūveṇeti |
2946:20: acaścetyevaṁ siddhayo hraṁsvadīrghayoryadaṇgrahaṇaṁ karoti tasyaitatprayojanamanaco'pyaṇo dīrghahrasvau yathā syātām agīṣkaḥ adhūṣkaḥ śvaliṅkaḥ madhuliṅkaḥ vaḍhāṁ varḍhumiti |
2946:21: evaṁ ca laṇityatra yannyāsakṛtoktaṁ ke pare halāmaṇāmasaṁbhavādityādi,
2946:22: tathā dīrghaśrutyā'caśceti saṁnidhāpite'ca eva dīrghatvena bhavitavyamityādi taccintyam |
2946:24: agīṣka ityādau visarjanīyādiṣu kṛteṣu hakāro'ṇ rephaśca nāsti |
2946:29: dīrghavidhau ca varḍhā varḍhumityādau pareṇa ṇakāreṇa pratyāhāragrahaṇādanaco'pi rephasya yaddīrghatvamuktam |
2946:31: yadyetatprayojanaṁ syāt tadā hayavarataṣṭakāreṇa pratyāhāraṁ kuryāt |
2946:33: atha vā'stu varḍhā varḍhumityādau dīrgha eva ṝkāraḥ tathāpi kṛte tasminnādguṇa ityakāraṛkārayorguṇenākāre raparatve ca kṛte tadeva rūpaṁ varḍhā varḍhumiti |
2946:34: ato'caśca iti siddhi yadaṇgrahaṇaṁ tatpūrveṇa ṇakāreṇa pratyāhārārtham |
2946:35: na ca pareṇa ṇakāreṇa pratyāhāragrahaṇe rephasya dīrghavaiyarthyātpunarādguṇabādhaḥ kalpanīyaḥ |
2946:37: savarṇavidhau pareṇa ṇakāreṇa pratyāhāragrahaṇe urṛt iti taparakaraṇaṁ jñāpakam |
2946:38: yadi tatrāpi pūrveṇa syāt evaṁ ca sūtropāttasya mātrikasya sthāne sūtropātte ṛkāre vidhīyamāne sāvarṇyābhāvād dvimātrikasya prāptireva nāstīti taparakaraṇamanarthakaṁ syāt |
2946:39: yacca laṇityatra nyāsakṛtoktaṁ dīrghasyāpi sthānino yathāśrutena hrasvenaiva bhavitavyamiti taparakaraṇamanarthakaṁ syād vyāvarttyābhāvāditi |
2946:45: atha sthāninaṁ prati jātirādeśaṁ prati vyaktiretacca na hṛdayagrāhi |
2946:46: evaṁ tarhi ṛkāraṝkārayoḥ samāhāradvandvaikatvena napuṁsakahrasvatvena ca urṛditi nirddeśe dīrghasyāpi sthānitvam |
2946:49: vyaktireke'ṇapratyāhāre ṝkārasyānantarbhāvāt sāvarṇyen ṛkāreṇa ṝkārasyāgrahaṇāddṛkārasyāctvaṁ nāsti |
2946:52: hrasvo napuṁsake prātipadikasya ityanenāco hrasvatvaṁ vidhīyate |
2946:53: acpratyāhāre ca ṛkāro'sti tatra ṛkāreṇa ṛtvajāterāśrayaṇād dvimātrikasyāpi ṝkārasya hrasvatvena bhāvyameveti yuktaṁ dīrghasyāpi sthānina ityādi ||
2946:54: iyaṁ ca paribhāṣā laṇityatra bhāṣyakāreṇa jñāpitā |
2946:56: “kiṁ punarayaṁ varṇotsattāvibra ṇakārassandehaheturanubaddho'pi punaranubadhyate yasmādanenāṇgrahaṇeyviṇgrahaṇeṣu ca saṁdehaḥ kiṁ pūrveṇa pareṇa veti evaṁ tarhi jñāpayatyācāryo bhavatyeṣā paribhāṣā vyākhyānata ityādi ||
2946:58: yāvatā karmaṇi ca ityanena pratiṣedhena bhāvyam |
2946:59: na ca kṛdyogalakṣaṇā ṣaṣṭhī samasyata ityanena samāsaḥ śakyate karttum |
2946:62: karmaṇi cetyanenobhayaprāptau karmaṇi ityanena niyamena yā ṣaṣṭhī tasyā eva samāsapratiṣedho vijñāyate |
2946:63: atra cārthe karttari ca iti sūtraṁ pramāṇam |
2946:64: anyathā apāṁ sraṣṭā odanasya bhojaka ityādau karmaṇi cetyanenaiva pratiṣedhasya siddhatvāt karttari cetyanarthakaṁ syāt |
2946:65: na ca praiṣyasya hārayitā praiṣyasya kārayitā ityatra hṛkroranyatarasyām iti karttari ṣaṣṭhīsamāsapratiṣedhārthamidamiti |
2946:67: yattu tṛjakābhyāṁ karttarītyatra vṛttāvuktaṁ tṛjgrahaṇamuttarārthamiti tatkarttari ceti sūtre sthite iti |
2946:69: ubhayaprāptāviti niyamena ca ṣaṣṭhī ṣaṣṭhī hetuprayoge ityataḥ prayogagrahaṇānuvṛtteryatra sāmarthyaprāptaṁ kartṛkarmaṇorubhayorupādānaṁ tatraiva yathā syāt |
2946:71: tathā hyatrāścaryaṁ pratipādyaṁ tacca durdohānāṁ gavāṁ karmaṇāmasuśikṣitasyāgopālakasya ca karttuḥ sāmarthyaprāpte upādāne ṣaṣṭhī bhavati nānyathā |
2946:72: viśeṣapratipattirityatra tu śiṣyādeḥ karturakiṁcitkaratvānna sāmarthyaprāptaṁ kartturupādānam |
2946:73: evaṁ ca sati antarddhau yenādarśanamicchati ityatra yeneti tṛtīyā na yuktā kartṛkarmaṇoḥ kṛti iti karttari ṣaṣṭhīvidhānāt |
2946:78: tathā cāntarddhau yenādarśanamicchatītyatra nyāsakṛtā ubhayaprāptau karmaṇi ityatra rakṣitena ca gamyamāne'pi karmaṇi niyamātṣaṣṭhyabhāvena antarddhau yeneti nirddeśasiddhiruktā |
2946:79: kiṁ tvevamaiuṇityatra tasya grahaṇaṁ bhavatyekeneti tatra tasyeti karttari ṣaṣṭhīti nyāse yaduktaṁ tanna śobhanam |
2946:80: tathā hyatrāpi gamyamāne grāhye karmaṇi ubhayaprāptāviti niyamātṣaṣṭyā na bhavitavyam |
2946:83: yatra sāmarthyaprāptamubhayorupādānaṁ sa ubhayaprāptau karmaṇītyasya viṣayaḥ |
2946:84: anyathā kartṛkarmaṇoḥ kṛtītyasya vidherubhayaprāptāvityādeśca viṣayavibhāgo na syāt |
2946:87: purāṁ bhettā devadatta ityādau abhihite kartari niyamāprasaṅgāt |
2946:89: ṣaṣthī hetuprayoge ityato'nuvarttamānamapi prayogagrahaṇamanaṅgīkṛtya yathā yuṣmābhirgamyamāne karmaṇi ubhayaprāptāviti niyama ucyate tathā'smābhirapyanabhihitādhikāramanaṅgīkṛtya vibhāgābhāva uktaḥ |
2946:91: akākārayīḥ pratiṣedhoḥ vaktavya ityanyena yatra niyamo bādhyate tatra vidheḥ kṛtārthatvāt |
2946:93: tathā kāryaḥ kaṭo devadattasyetyatrābhihite karmaṇi ṣaṣṭhīprasaṅgācca |
2946:95: kartṛkarmaṇoḥ kṛtītyasya vidherubhayaprāptāvityādeśca vidheriti naite samānādhikaraṇe ṣaṣṭyau kiṁ tarhi vaiyadhikaraṇye |
2946:96: tadayamarthaḥ kartṛkarṁaṇoḥ kṛtītyasya saṁbandhī yo vidhiḥ karttari ca iti,
2946:97: tathobhayaprāptau karmaṇītyasya yo vidhiḥ karmaṇi ca iti etayorviṣayavibhāgo na syādityayamabhiprāyaḥ |
2946:98: yadi gamyamāne'pi karttari ubhayaprāptāviti karmaṇi niyamaḥ syāt tadā idhmavraścana ityādāvapi karaṇe lyuṭi karmaṇi ceti niṣedhaḥ syāt kartṛlyuṭyapi idhmapravraścano devadatta ityatrāpi ātmanā devadattenetyasya karturgamyamānatvādubhayaprāptiravyāhataiva |
2946:99: evaṁ ca karmaṇi yā kā citṣaṣṭhī tasyā eva sarvasyāḥ karmaṇi cetyanena samāsapratiṣedhe siddhe kartari cetyanārambhaṇīyaṁ syāt |
2946:100: ārabdhaṁ cāto yuktamuktaṁ viṣayavibhāgo na syāditi |
2946:103: evaṁ tarhi purāmbhettā devadatta ityādau yathā kartturabhihitatvānniyamo na bhavati tathā śabdānuśāsanamityatrāpi karturaprayogāt |
2946:104: tatra yathā karttṛṣaṣṭhīprāptyā vināpi gamyamāne karttari niyama ucyate tathābihite'pi karttari niyamamuttkā (niyamamuktā?)
2946:111: yatkāryabhāk tatkaryaṁ prati nimittaṁ na bhavatītyarthaḥ |
2946:112: tenādhyetā adhyāpakaḥ śayitā śāyaka ityatra iṅśīṅorṅitvāt kṅiti ca iti guṇavṛddhipratiṣedho na bhavati |
2946:113: tathā'ririṣatītyatra dvirvacane'ci iti sthānivadbhāvo na bhavati |
2946:114: yadi syāt iso dvirvacane kṛte'rīṣatīti syāt ||
2946:116: na ca kṅiti cetyanena iglakṣaṇāyā eva vṛddheḥ pratiṣedhaḥ kriyate,
2946:117: ato'jlakṣaṇāyā api vṛddheḥ pratiṣedhārthaṁ dīdhīvevyorubhayorupādānaṁ syāditi vācyam |
2946:118: indhibhavatibhyāṁ ca ityatra bhavatigrahaṇenājlakṣaṇāyā api vṛddheḥ pratiṣedho bhavatītyasyārthasya jñāpitatvāt |
2946:119: nanu ca bhāṣye vuko nityatvādindheścchāndasatvādindhibhavativyāṁ ceti sūtraṁ pratyākhyātaṁ tathā dīdhīvevīṭāmityapi |
2946:122: iṭaścāpi grahaṇamanarthakaṁ neḍvaśi kṛti ityata iḍgrahaṇānuvṛttau ārddhadhātukasyeḍvalādeḥ ityatra yadiḍgahaṇaṁ tadiṭo vikārābhāvārtham |
2946:123: tato laghūpadhaguṇābhāvāt siddhaṁ kaṇitā śvo raṇitā śva iti |
2946:124: na caivaṁ pipaṭhīrapāṭhīdityādāvapi dīrghatvaṁ na syāditi vaktavyam |
2946:127: tarhi pipaṭhīṁṣi brāhmaṇakulānītyatra sāntamahataḥ saṁyogasya iti dīrghatvaṁ na syāditi cenna |
2946:129: na ca kvau lupte na sthānivadityasti |
2946:130: kvau vidhaṁ prati na sthānivaditīdaṁ vārttikamiti kaiyaṭena vyākhyātam |
2946:131: evaṁ ca kvau nātra num api tu sarvanāmasthāne |
2946:133: tathā ca maparyantasya ityatra tena parigrahaṇaṁ varjanīyārthamityuktam |
2946:136: yuṣmayateḥ kvip tataḥ svādayaḥ atra varjanīyābhāvādādeśā na bhavanti |
2946:140: bhāṣyamate na hi kāryītyasyā liṅgaṁ nāsti |
2946:141: sthaṇḍilācchayitari ityatra śayitarīti nirddeśo'syā liṅgaṁ kuṭādiṣu kuṅ śabde ityasya pāṭho vā ||
2946:143: iglakṣaṇavṛddhipratiṣedhastāvat kṅitpratyayanimittaka eva saṁbhavati na tu kṅiddhātunimittakaḥ |
2946:144: ato mṛṣṭaḥ mṛṣṭavān nyanuvīt nyaghuvīt ityādau kṅinnimittakaḥ pratyaya eva parato vṛddhipratiṣedhastatsāhacaryād guṇapratiṣedho'pi bhūyate bobhūyate ityādau kaṅinnimittakaḥ pratyaya eva kartavyaḥ |
2946:145: ata evādhyetā śayitetyatra kṅiddhātunimittakena pratiṣedhena na bhavitavyam |
2946:146: aririṣātītyatrāpi dvirvacaneci ityajādeśaṁ prati nimittabhāvo'kāryitvenaiva niyataḥ tadevamajādeśasaṁbandhe'cītyasyākāryitvaṁ tatsāhacaryād dvirvacanavidhāne'pi yadyakāryitvamevācītyasya tadā sthānivattvaṁ yathā cakruturiti |
2946:147: aririṣatītyatra tu dvitīyasyakāco dvirvacanādikārasya dvirvacanabhāktamiti dvirvacanavidhāne'cītyasya kāryitvaṁ na punarakāryitvamiti |
2946:150: anyathā asyāṁ satyāṁ prorṇunaviṣatītyatra guṇāvādeśayoḥ kṛtayordvicane'cīti sthānivattvaṁ na syāt |
2946:152: tathā dvirvacane'cītyatrācīti kimityuktā heghrīyate dedhmīyate iti yatpratyudāhṛtaṁ tannopapadyate dvyaṅgavaikalyāt yathaiva yaṅ ajādirna bhavati tathā dvirvacananimittamapīti |
2946:158: aririṣatītyatra sthānivattvena iso dvirvacanaprasaṅgādajādereva sanaḥ kāryitvaṁ nimittatvaṁ ca |
2946:159: prorṇunaviṣatītyatra tu ajādeḥ sano nimittatvaṁ kāryitvaṁ ca dhātornuśabdasyaiva tasyaiva dvirvacanavidhānāt |
2946:160: ato'tra sanaḥ sākṣāt kāryitvaṁ nāstīti yuktameva nimittatvenāśrayaṇamiti |
2946:161: evamapi śādhītyatra śāhau ityasya śādeśasya dhibhāvaṁ prati samānāśraye hāvasiddhatvanna syāditi |
2946:168: itaretarāśrayāṇi kāryāṇi viroddhānna pravarttanta iti nyāyaḥ yaduktamitaretarāśrayatvādaprasiddhiriti |
2946:174: tathā śāstre gārgīya ityādau vṛddhisaṁjñayā bhāvitasyāpi vṛddhisaṁjñā prakliptiḥ |
2946:175: anyathā śālārairauprabhṛtiṣu sāvakāśā vṛddhisaṁjñā itaretarāśrayatvānna syāt ||
2946:176: jñāpakaṁ cātra igyaṇaḥ saṁprasāraṇam ityatra saṁprasāraṇena yaṇaḥ sthāne iko bhāvyante |
2946:182: yaduktaṁ sarvāṇītaretarāśrayāṇi bhāṣye parihṛtāni siddhaṁ tu nityaśabdatvāditīti |
2946:183: athaitatsyāt yaṇaḥ sthāne igvidhīyate sthānyādeśabhāvaśca pauruṣeyaḥ tatkṛto nityatvamiti |
2946:185: loke hi iṣṭaṁ yaṣṭetyādayo nityāḥ tatra yajerarthe ijirviśiṣṭaviṣaye sādhurityetāvati puruṣāśrayatvaṁ svabhāvata eva yajeḥ sthāne ijisiddhiḥ ||
2946:189: ādyantau ṭākitau ityatrādyantaśabdayoravayavavacanatvāt ṭitkitorāgamayorādyantāvayavatvamatidiṣṭaṁ midaco'ntyātpara ityatrāpi antagrahaṇanuvṛttyā mito'pyantāvayavatvam |
2946:190: avayavāścāvayavigrahaṇena gṛhyante ityuktamataḥ siddheyaṁ paribhāṣā āgamāstadguṇībhūtā iti ||
2946:193: yadyāgamigrahaṇenāgamo na gṛhyeta tadā kārayitavyamityādau itā vyavahitatvādeva ṇilopo na prāpnotīti kimaniṭītyaneneti jñāpakam |
2946:194: tena sarveṣāmityatra suṭaḥ subgrahaṇena grahaṇājjhalādau supi etvaṁ siddhyati ||
2946:195: nanu asyāṁ satyāṁ cicchidatuḥ cicchiduḥ ityādau halādiḥ śeṣeṇa tuko nivṛttiḥ prāpnoti |
2946:198: tatracaikamevedaṁ lakṣaṇaṁ sakṛdeva papāṭhetyādau anāderhalo nivṛttiṁ karoti |
2946:199: tadevaṁ cicchidaturityādau halādiḥ śeṣānantaraṁ yastuk tasya nivṛttirna prāpnoti |
2946:202: anyathā'jāderdvitīyasyetyatra bhāṣyakāreṇa ca maitreyeṇa ca yadudāhṛtam |
2946:206: yadyevaṁ vavṛte ityādau urattve raparatve ca kṛte rephasya lopo na syāt |
2946:208: halādiḥ śeṣa ityatra urat ityanuvarttiṣyate tena uraditi kṛte rephasya nivṛttirbhaviṣyati |
2946:209: evaṁ tarhi uñcheraiñcicchadityatra tuki kṛte halādiḥ śeṣeṇa tasya nivṛttiḥ syādeva |
2946:211: checa ityatra hrasvagrahaṇe'nuvarttamāne punaryaccakāreṇa tasyānuvarttanaṁ tatsāmarthyāt hrasva āgamī svīkriyate na tu hrasvāntaḥ samudāyaḥ |
2946:212: evaṁ cābhyāsāvayavasyaiva bhaktastuk kriyate tatsāmarthyādihāvayavāvayavo'pi avayavigrahaṇena na gṛhyate anyatra tu gṛhyata eva |
2946:213: ataeva śerata ityatrāvayavāvayavaḥ samudāyāvayavo bhavatītyuktā śīṅo ruṭ ityatra śīṅaḥ sārvadhātuke guṇa uktaḥ |
2946:214: evaṁ tu śobhanacchāya ityatra tukā uttarapadasya vyavadhānātpuṁvadbhāvo na syāditi dūṣaṇam |
2946:216: hrasvaṁ pratīdaṁ jñāpakaṁ padāntādvā ityatra tu nāsti |
2946:217: dadhi chādayatītyatra svaravidhau vyañjanamavidyamānavaditi tiṅñatiṅa iti nighātaḥ śakyate karttum |
2946:218: asyāṁ satyāṁ prātipadikāntanum vibhaktiṣu ca ityatra numgrahaṇasya prayojanaṁ na dṛśyate |
2946:219: bhartṛhariṇā tūktam yaḥ prātipadikānto nakāro na bhavati tadarthaṁ numgrahaṇaṁ prāhiṇvaditi atra hi hiverlaṅi numo ṇatvamiti |
2946:220: tatra ca pūvapadādhikāraḥ samāse ca pūvottarapadavyavahāraḥ tatkathamiha ṇatvamiti na vyaktīkṛtamiti bhāgavṛttikṛtoktam |
2946:223: alpāctaramityanena prātipadikānta ityādau numaḥ pūrvanipāte karttavye yatprātipadikavibhaktimadhyasthaṁ numgrahaṇaṁ karoti tadevaṁ bodhayati yo'nayoreva madhyastho numnakārastasya ṇatvaṁ bhavatīti |
2946:224: aṭkughāṅnumvyavāsepi ityatra bhāgavṛttikṛtā pratipāditaṁ numaḥ pūvanipātalakṣaṇavyabhicāracihnāt prenvamityatra ṇatvābhāvaḥ kṣubhnādityādvā tena saha samānam |
2946:225: nanu mitvānnumaḥ pūrvāntatve niṣkauśāmvinī kule ityatra paratvānnumi kṛte napuṁsakahrasvatvaṁ na prāpnoti ajantatvābhāvāt |
2946:227: naiṣa doṣaḥ vibhaktyāśrayaṇād bahiraṅgo num hrasvatamantaraṅgaṁ vibhaktyanāśrayatvāt tatprathamaṁ bhaviṣyati |
2946:233: ṣaṣṭhyā nirddiṣṭasya samudāyasya tadekadeśasya vā''deśā bhavanti |
2946:235: pādaḥ pat iti ṣaṣṭhyā nirddhiṣṭasyaiva pādaḥ sthāne padbhavati dvipadaḥ paśyeti nāṅgādhikāraparibhāṣayā tadantasya |
2946:236: tathā bhavetāmityatra tasaḥ sthāne tāmādeśo bhavati na sayāsuṭaḥ |
2946:238: udaḥ sthāstambhoḥ pūrvasya iti tiṣṭhaterādideśasya pūrvasavarṇo vidhīyamāna udasthādityatrāṭo na bhavati |
2946:239: tathā ṣyaṅaḥ samprasāraṇam iti ṣyaṅekadeśasya samprasāraṇe vārāhīputra ityatrānayā rephavakārayoḥ samprasāraṇābhāvo vyākhyātaḥ ||
2946:240: iyaṁ paribhāṣā ṣaṣṭhī sthāne yogā ityasyārthe paṭhyate |
2946:242: yadyapyekaśataṁ ṣaṣdyarthāḥ yāvantaste tāvantaḥ ṣaṣṭhyāmuccāritāyāṁ sarve prāpnuvanti arthā ye punaḥ samīpāntaravikārādyāḥ,
2946:243: śabdasya tu ko'nyo bhavitumarhati anyadataḥ sthānāt |
2946:245: astebhūrbhavatīti sandehaḥ kiṁ sthāne samīpe vā tatra samīpe na bhaviṣyati dvayorekārthayorekatra prayogānupapatteḥ |
2946:247: sarvasandeṣvidamupatiṣṭhate bhavati hi vyākhyānato viśeṣapratipattirna hi sandehādalakṣaṇamiti sthāne iti vyākhyāsyāmaḥ |
2946:250: kiṁ prayojanaṁ ṣaṣṭhyantaṁ sthāne yathā prasajyeta |
2946:251: yataḥ ṣaṣṭhī uccāritā tadeva kāryopayogi yathā syāt |
2946:253: asyāṁ satyāṁ śīṅo ruṭ ityatra yannyāsakṛtoktaṁ yadi ruḍāgamo jhakārasyaiva syāt tadā'dādeśo jhakārasya na syāt tasyaiva ruṭaḥ syāt ādeḥ parasyeti vacanāt |
2946:254: tathā maparyantasya ityatra yadudāhṛtaṁ yuvakāmiti sākackasya syāditi |
2946:260: tenārvaṇastrasāvanaña iti arvantau arvanta ityatra trādeśo'ntyasyaiva bhavati na sarvasya |
2946:264: tathā hi taparastatkālasya iti udityeṣā saṁjñā ukāramātrasyaiva vidhīyate |
2946:265: evaṁ ca diva udityanena ukāra eva kevalo vidhīyate na tūcchabdaḥ |
2946:267: anyathā'tobhisa aisa ityatra kā gatiḥ syāt |
2946:268: na hyatrāta ādeśo vidhīyate kiṁ tarhi atsaṁjñayā akāraḥ saṁjñī nirddiśyate ||
2946:269: yattu sthāghvoricca ityatroktaṁ icca kasya takārettvamiti tatpratipādakaikadeśānāṁ pratipādyaikadeśatvamabhyupagamya |
2946:270: tatmatenaiva titsvaritam ityatra tiditi pratyayagrahaṇamiti bhāṣye uktam |
2946:271: taparastatkālasya ityatra tu varṇa eva saṁjñītyuktaṁ na punastaparaḥ samudāyaḥ |
2946:274: iyaṁ ca paribhāṣā anubandhā avayavā ityatra pakṣe ||
2946:276: yadyanubandhenāpyanekāltvaṁ syāt tadā sarve ityādau śībhāvasyānekāltvādeva sarvādeśe jasaḥ siddhe śidgrahaṇamanarthakaṁ syāt |
2946:277: nanu dhvasoreddhāvabhyāsalopaśca iti lopaḥ śidvaktavya iti yaḥ śidabhyupagamyate tatra sarvādeśārthaṁ śidgrahaṇaṁ syāt dehi dhehīti sarvasyaiva lopo bhavati |
2946:280: atha vā lopaḥ śidvaktavya iti nāśrayaṇīyam |
2946:283: nanu yadi iyaṁ paribhāṣā'sti ṇal tarhi sarvādeśo na prāpnoti |
2946:287: sarvādeśe sati ṇalo ṇakārasyopadeśe pratyayāditvamiti tataścuṭū itītsaṁjñā tatastasyānubandhatvam |
2946:288: tadevaṁ sarvādeśapūrvakamanubandhatvaṁ sarvādeśatāṁ vihantuṁ na kṣamate sarvādeśatāyāḥ pūrvameva niṣpannatvāt ||
2946:291: tena gave hitaṁ gohitaṁ rāyaḥ kulaṁ raikulamityatra pratyayalakṣaṇenācīti avāyādeśau na bhavataḥ |
2946:292: lavaṇā yavāgūrityatra lavaṇāllugiti ṭhako lukikṛte pratyayalakṣaṇena ṭhagantāṭṭiḍḍhāṇañ iti ṅībna bhavati |
2946:293: ṅīpo varṇamātrāśrayatvaṁ yathā syādityevamarthamakārastatrānuvṛttaṣṭidādibhirviśeṣyate na tvakāreṇa ṭidādayaḥ |
2946:294: ata eva kvarapkhyunāmiti ṣaṣṭhyā nirddeśaḥ kṛtaḥ ||
2946:295: ayaṁ cārthaḥ pratyayalope pratyayalakṣaṇam ityatra dvitīyena pratyayagrahaṇena sādhitaḥ |
2946:297: tallakṣaṇamiti vaktavye pratyayalakṣaṇamityatra yatpunaḥ pratyayagrahaṇaṁ pratyayāśritameva kāryaṁ pratyayalakṣaṇena yathā syāt yathā suptiṅangaṁ padam iti,
2946:299: jñāpakaṁ cātra śravaṇākārttikīcaitrībhya iti śravaṇeti ṭabanto nirddeśaḥ ||
2946:300: nanu yadi varṇāśraye pratyayalakṣaṇaṁ nāsti tarhi atṛṇeḍityatra tṛṇahaim iti im na prāpnoti imāgamasya halvarṇāśrayatvāt |
2946:303: etaduktaṁ bhavati pratyaye dvividhaṁ kāryaṁ pratyayanimittamapratyayanimittaṁ ca tatra pratyayanimittaṁ yattadeva pratyayalopalakṣaṇena yathā syāditaranmābhūdityevamarthaṁ pratyayalope pratyayalakṣaṇamityatra dvitīyaṁ pratyayagrahaṇam |
2946:304: tenaico'yavāyāva ityavādirvaṇāśrayatvātparibhāṣayā khaṇḍyate imāgamastu pratyayanimitta eva aṅgādhikāreṇa pratyayākṣepāttadbhavane ko virodhaḥ |
2946:305: na caivaṁ śriyai idaṁ śryarthamityatrājādipratyaye iyaṅṅāśaṅkanīyaḥ |
2946:307: yattu śāsa idaṅhaloḥ ityatrāsyāḥ prāyikatvamuktā nyāsakāreṇātṛṇeḍityatra varṇāśraye'pīmāgamo bhavatītyuktam |
2946:309: nanu gohitamityādau luko vidhānaṁ na tu lopasya tadevaṁ pratyayalakṣaṇasya prasaṅga eva nāsti tatkiṁ paribhāsāśrayaṇena |
2946:318: jñāpakaṁ cātra tasminniti nirddiṣṭe pūvasya ityata iti śabde prakṛte tasmādityuttarasya iti punaritiśabdaḥ |
2946:319: yadi hi sahaiva padānāmanuvṛttiḥ syāt tadā nirddiṣṭagrahaṇavaditiśabdo'pyanuvarttiṣyate pūvasūtrāt |
2946:322: evaṁ hi sati nirddiṣṭagrahaṇameva kevalamanuvarttate netikaraṇamiti ||
2946:325: arthavadanarthakavicāre arthavata eva śabdasya grahaṇaṁ nānarthakasya |
2946:326: tena vanora ca ityanena kvanivvanipoḥ karṭṭṛrūpeṇārthena sārthakayoreva vano rephādeśo bhavati |
2946:331: tena plīhānau plīhāna ityatrāpi niyamena dīrghavyāvṛttirna bhavati |
2946:338: yo hi svarūpaparaḥ prayujyate tasya svarūpamevārthaḥ tatparatvāttasya |
2946:341: ata evārthavat sūtre vanaṁ dhanamityatra nāntasyāvadheranarthakatvamuktam |
2946:342: yadā tvatiśunyādau vanādayo varṇasamudāyāḥ svarūpaparā bhavanti tadā teṣāṁ bhavatyevārthavattvamiti |
2946:343: āto lopa iṭi ca ityatra tu dvayorapi nirarthakasyāgamasya sārthakasya ca pratyayasyeṭo grahaṇam |
2946:344: iṭo't ityatra viśeṣaṇārthe ṭhakārādau karttavye yadiṭaṣṭakāraḥ kṛtastasyaitatprayojanamāto lopa iṭi cetyatra sāmānyagrahaṇaṁ yathā syāditi |
2946:345: etaccāto lopa iṭi cetyatra ṭita ātmanepadānāṁ ṭere ityatra ca bhāṣyakhyākhyānaṁ rakṣitenoktam |
2946:347: tatheḍvahimahiṅityatra pratyāhārthaṁ varṇāntare karttavye ṅakārakaraṇaṁ ṅitkāryārthamapi syāt,
2946:348: evaṁ ca sasraṁsimaha ityatrāniditāṁ hala ityanunāsikalopaḥ prasajyeta |
2946:351: tathā śe ityatra sūtre kāśe kuśe iti padaikadeśasyānarthakasya |
2946:353: tathā hi pranidāśati pranidhāvatītyatra satyāmapi ghusaṁjñāyāṁ nergadādi sūtreṇa ṇatvaṁ nāsti dādhāśabdau prati nerūpasargasaṁjñāyā abhāvāt |
2946:355: na cetau dādhau prati kriyāyoga iti |
2946:356: sani mīmāghu ityādau cāṅgasya ghorgrahaṇādasakārāditvācca didāśiṣatītyādau na doṣaḥ |
2946:357: kāśe kuśe śeśabdasya lākṣaṇikatvāt pragṛhyasaṁjñāyā abhāvo nyāsakṛtaiva śe ityatra vyākhyātaḥ |
2946:360: tena pralambata ityatrānarthakādapi praśabdādavyayādāpsupa iti subluk siddho bhavati |
2946:361: anarthakasyāvyayatvamupasargatvaṁ prātipadikatvaṁ ca nipātānāmanarthakānāmarthavatkṛtāni kāryāṇi bhavantīti vacanāt |
2946:363: ata eva nipātasya cānarthakasya prātipadikasaṁjñā vaktavyeti bhāṣye pratyākhyātam |
2946:364: yadyevaṁ nipātatvād yadavyayatvaṁ tatsāmarthyādeva subluk siddhaḥ |
2946:368: ihānarthakatvādvibhaktyabhāvo na pūrvapakṣyate prātipadikārthetyatra prātipadikagrahaṇāt tasya hyetatprayojanamanarthakādapi prātipadikamātrātprathamā yathā syāditi ||
2946:369: iyaṁ ca paribhāṣā svaṁ rūpam ityatra bhāṣye jñāpitā |
2946:371: svaṁ śabdasyetyucyamāne yadyapi śabdasya rūpamarthaśca svaṁ bhavati |
2946:375: tadevampratyāsannabuddhitvādaheyatvena nityasambandhitvācca śabdasya rūpameva grāhyaṁ nārtho viparyayāt |
2946:376: ataḥ svaṁgrahaṇādeva rūpagrahaṇe siddhe vyākaraṇaśāstre rūpavadarthopyaṅgīkriyata iti labhyate ||
2946:377: atha vā vraścādi sūtre bhrājagrahaṇamasyāstitve jñāpakam |
2946:378: yadi hyanarthakasyāpi grahaṇaṁ syāttadā rājagrahaṇenaiva bhrājaikadeśasyāpi grahaṇe siddhe rājabhrājeti bhrājagrahaṇaṁ na kuryāt |
2946:379: kṛtaṁ cāto jñāpakamarthavata eva grahaṇaṁ nānarthakasyeti ||
2946:386: yatheko yaṇaci iti nirarthakasyāpīko nirarthake'pi yaṇ bhavati bhavatyatra bhavatviti |
2946:387: anyathā ṅībādisaṁbandhina eva sārthakasyekaḥ sārthake evāci yaṇ syāt kumāryauśvaśvāviti |
2946:390: iko jhal ityatregiti yoyaṁ varṇasamudāyaḥ sa kiṁ sārthakaḥ pratyāhāro gṛhyatāṁ nirarthako vā dhāturiti vicāre yuktameva rakṣitenārthavatparibhāṣayā pratyāhāragrahaṇamuktam |
2946:391: yataḥ pratyāhāre vyavasthite uttarakālaṁ varṇagrahaṇaṁ na tu prathamata eva ||
2946:392: nanu yadi varṇagrahaṇe'rthavatparibhāṣā nāsti kathaṁ tarhi vija iṭ ityatrārthavata iṭo grahaṇaṁ nyāsakṛtā śaṅkyate |
2946:394: kathaṁ vā sīyuḍāgame kṛte kevalasyeṭaḥ sārthakatvam sasīyuṭkasyaivārthavattvāt,
2946:396: kathamiḍgrahaṇe'rthavatparibhāṣābhidhīyate yāvatā āto lopa iṭi ca ityatroktamiḍvahimahiṅityatra ṭhe karttavye ṭitkaraṇamāgamapratyayayorubhayorapi grahaṇārthamiti |
2946:401: yato yatrānubandhamuccārya kāryaṁ vidhīyate tatra varṇāśritaḥ pratiṣedho na bhavati |
2946:402: atra ca graho'liṭi dīrgha ityatreḍapavāde īṭi karttavye'grahīdityatra sthānivadbhāvena iṭa īṭi iti sico lopārthaṁ yadetatkṛtaṁ dīrghagrahaṇaṁ tadetatsāmānyajñāpakam |
2946:403: tena yatrānubandhopādānaṁ tatra na varṇagrahaṇeṣviti na pravarttate |
2946:408: karmeṇiṅ iti ṅakāreṇa saṅiti pratyāhāraṁ kṛtvā saṅantā dhātava iti karttavye sanādyantā dhātava iti jñāpakāt |
2946:410: kuruta ityatra tu ñittvādātmanepadaṁ gandhanādisūtrādanantaraṁ nānuparābhyāmiti karttavye'nuparābhyāṁ kṛña iti yatkṛtaṁ tatsvaritañita ityasyāpi pratiṣedho bhavatīti jñāpanārtham |
2946:412: yastu svādi sūtre auḍasiti kṛte ḍitvāṭṭilopo doṣa uktaḥ |
2946:421: vija iṭ ityitra na kiṁ cidāgamasya ṅittve prayojanam |
2946:425: yadyarthavatparibhāṣā varṇagrahaṇepi syāttadā u itītyatretiśabdekāre'narthake'rthavatparibhāṣayaiva yaṇādeśāprasaṅgaḥ siddha ityuña iti pragṛhyasaṁjñā na kṛtā syāt |
2946:427: atha vā bhakṣyeṇa miśrīkaraṇam iti nirddeśe jñāpakaḥ ||
2946:432: tenehetidama iś iti trimātrasya sthānina āntaratamyāt trimātra ādeśo na bhavati |
2946:433: tathā he anaḍvan ityatrāmsaṁbuddhau iti dīrgho na bhavati |
2946:434: lavitā lavitumityatra vṝto vā itīṭo vikalpena dīrghavidhānādiṭo na sarvarṇagrahaṇamityāhaḥ ||
2946:435: iyaṁ ca paribhāṣā aṇuditsarvaṇasya cāpratyaya ityatrāpratyaya ityasyaivārthaḥ paṭhyate |
2946:437: pratyāyyate vidhīyate bhāvyate iti pratyayaḥ na pratyayo'pratyayaḥ,
2946:438: abhāvyamāna ityarthaḥ apratyayo'ṇ sarvarṇān gṛhṇātītyasminnarthe bhāvyamānoṇ savarṇānna gṛhṇātīti vyaktamavatiṣṭhate ||
2946:441: anyathā dīrghasya sthāne sāvarṇyārddirgha eva syāt ||
2946:443: tenāmū ityatra dvimātrasyaukārasya dvimātra evokāro bhavati |
2946:444: atra cārthe diva ut iti taparakaraṇaṁ jñāpakam |
2946:445: yadi bhāvyamāno'ṇ sarvathaiva savarṇānna hṛhṇāti tadā dyubhyāmityatra cchroḥ śūḍanunāsike ca ityūdyapi kṛte dīrghasya sthāne hrasvaḥ siddhaḥ syāt kiṁ tapakaraṇena |
2946:446: tatkṛtaṁ jñāpayati kva cidbhāvyamāno'ṇ sarkṇan gṛhṇātīti |
2946:447: śāsa idaṅ haloḥ iti taparakaraṇaṁ vā jñāpakamiti ||
2946:451: yasminniti saptamḻnirdiṣṭe algrahaṇe varṇagrahaṇe yo vidhiḥ sa tadādau samudāye bhavati na tadante ||
2946:452: tena pivatereśi pape ityatra pāghrādi sūtreṇa pivādeśo na bhavati |
2946:456: yadi hyatra tadantavidhiḥ syāt śriyo luluvaturityatra na syāt halantatvāt ||
2946:457: ayaṁ cārtho yena vidhi sūtre tadantavidyapavādastadādividhirupasaṁkhyātaḥ paribhāṣārūpeṇa padyata iti ||
2946:460: uto vṛddhirluki halītyanuvarttamāne halādau guṇe prāpte'pṛktagrahaṇaṁ halmātra eva yathā syāddhalādau mābhūdityevamarthaṁ kriyamāṇaṁ jñāpayatyastīyaṁ paribhāṣā yasminvidhirityādi |
2946:462: apṛktagrahaṇe tu varṇamātra eva bhavati praurṇoditi |
2946:463: yadyevaṁ kṅiti saṁprasāraṇaṁ kṅādāveva syād gṛhīto gṛhītiriti |
2946:466: kṅitīti nedaṁ varṇagrahaṇamiti kṅāvitau yasyeti bahubrīhiṇā varṇasamudāyasya parigrahāt ||
2946:471: iyaṁ paribhāṣā yena vidhi sūtrasyaiva sāmarthyāllabdho'rthaḥ padyate |
2946:473: yeneti karaṇe tṛtīyā na cākartṛkaṁ karaṇamastīti karttāpyāśritaḥ |
2946:474: sa punariha saṁbandhiśabdatvādantaśabdenāvayavavācinā sannidhāpitaḥ samudāyo vijñāyate |
2946:475: sa ca karttā tribhiḥ prakāraiḥ sannihito bhavati |
2946:477: yathā īdūdeddvivacanam iti dvivacanaṁ karttṛbhūtaṁ nirdiṣṭaṁ yattadīdādibhiḥ karaṇaiḥ pragṛhyasaṁjñāṁ vidadhāti |
2946:479: yathā erac ityatra dhātorityadhikārāt prakaraṇāddhātuḥ karttā saṁnidhāpitaḥ sa ikāreṇa karaṇenācaṁ vidadhāti |
2946:481: yathā iko jhal ityatra dhātoreva ca san vidhīyate iti sāmarthyāddhātuḥ karttā saṁnidhāpita ikā karaṇena sanaḥ kittvaṁ vidadhāti |
2946:482: tadevamīdūdeddvivacanamityādau pragṛhyasaṁjñāyā vidhīyamānasya karmaṇo vidherīdūdetaḥ karaṇasya vidhānasya dvivacanasya ca kartturvidhibhājaḥ saṁbhavādyena vidhistadantasyeti tadantavidhirvidhīyate |
2946:483: tadevaṁ yena vidhiḥ ityasya sūtrasyārtha evāyamevaṁvidho vidhividhānavidhibhājāṁ trayāṇāṁ sannidhāne tadantavidhirbhavati |
2946:485: nanu śabdānuśāsanaprastāvācchabdarūpaṁ karttṛ vidhibhāk syāt tatkathaṁ kartturabhāvo'bhidhīyate |
2946:487: śabdarūpaṁ kartṛtvena nāśrīyate atiprasaṅgāditi suptiṅantaṁ padam ityatra rakṣitena vyākhyātam |
2946:488: tenaico'yavāyāva ityādau śabdarūpasyāsvīkāradejmātrasyaiva sthānitvamajmātrasya paratvaṁ naijantasyājādāviti |
2946:490: nanu nirddiśyamānasyādeśā bhavantītyeca eva sthāne ādeśena bhavitavyaṁ naijantasya |
2946:494: tathā na yena vidhi sūtre bhāgavṛttikṛtoktam |
2946:495: iko yaṇaci itīkā acāvayavenāvayavinaḥ samudāyasya saṁnidhāpitatvādigantasyājādau yaṇādeśa iti varṇavidhireva na syāt tiṣṭhatu dadhyaśāna tvaṁ śākeneti |
2946:496: kiṁ tu satyapogantasyājādau yaṇādeśe padavidhitvaṁ na bhavatyeva padasya padāt supsupetyādyanuccāraṇena ṣaṇādeśādikāryāṇāṁ vidhānāditi ||
2946:500: ekayoganirddiṣṭānāṁ saha vā pravṛttiḥ saha vā nivṛttiḥ ||
2946:502: ekayoganirddiṣṭānāṁ padānāṁ pravṛttirvā nivṛttirvā sahaiva syāt |
2946:506: ṛvarṇāntāddhātoḥ parau liṅsicāvātmanepadeṣu kitau bhavata iti |
2946:507: tatra hi ṛ iti ṛvarṇānto dhāturgṛhyate na ṛ gatāviti |
2946:509: śailīyamācāryasya yatrāsya dhātorgrahaṇamicchati tatrāvaśyaṁ śtipā nirddeśaṁ karoti |
2946:513: yatrāsya dhātorgrahaṇamicchati tatra sandehavicchedāyāvaśyaṁ śtipā nirdeśaṁ karoti |
2946:514: yatra na sandehastatra karoti na karoti ca |
2946:515: evaṁ ca smipūṅrañjvaśāṁ sani ityatra ṛgatāvityasya grahaṇe'pi na śtipā nirddeśaḥ |
2946:516: tatra hi kiraśca pañcabhya ityatra dṛṅdhṛṅorgrahaṇānna sandehaḥ |
2946:517: anyathā didiriṣate didhariṣate ityatra smipūṅrañjvaśāṁ sani ityeveṭaḥ siddhatvāṭḍhṛṅdhṛṅorgrahaṇamanarthakaṁ syāt |
2946:521: kiraśca pañcabhya ityatra kṛgṛsvīkāra eva viccheda heturiti |
2946:523: yato vṝto vā ityanuvṛtto iṭ sani vā iti vikalpeneṭi prāpte nityamiṭo vidhānārthaṁ kṛgṝgrahaṇaṁ syāt |
2946:525: yadi nityamiṭo vidhānārthaṁ kṝgṝgrahaṇaṁ syāt tadā kiraśca pañcabhya iti sūtramakṛtvā smipūṅrañjvaśkṛgṛpracchāṁ sanītyevaṁ kuryāt |
2946:526: na cottaratra rudādibhyaḥ sārvadhātuke ityatra pañcabhya ityasya prayojanamastīti vācyam |
2946:527: rudādipañcadhātuparigrahārthaṁ tatra vṛtkaraṇaṁ karttavyaṁ tata eva vyavasthā bhaviṣyati |
2946:528: atha vā kṛgṛsvīkāra iti bahubrīhirayaṁ kṛgroḥ svīkāro yasminniti kṛgṛsvīkāraḥ kiraśca pañcabhya iti yogastasminkṛgṛsvīkāre kiraśca pañcabhya iti sūtra evāntarbhūtayorddaṅdhṛñorgrahaṇaṁ vicchedaheturityarthaḥ |
2946:529: atha vā smipūṅrañjvaśāṁ sani ityatra ṛgrahaṇaṁ hrasvāntārthaṁ tāvanna bhavati dṛṅdhṛṅgrahaṇāt |
2946:530: dīrghantādapi yadi iṭ sani vā iti vikalpaḥ syād dīrghārthamapi na syānnityavikalpayorvirodhāt |
2946:531: evaṁ ca ṛgrahaṇamanarthakaṁ tasmādiṭ sani vā ityatra ṛgrahaṇaṁ nānuvarttate vṛṅvṛñāvevānuvarttate vṛṅvṛñoreveḍvikalpaḥ ṛtāṁ tu smipūṅrañjvaśāṁ sani ityanenaiva nityamiṭ siddha iti kṛgṛgrahaṇameva vicchedaheturiti ||
2946:532: jñāpakaṁ cātra hanaḥ sic iti sijgrahaṇam |
2946:533: yadyekasūtranirddiṣṭayorapi padayorekamanuvarttate nāparamiti tadā liṅsicāvātmanepadeṣu ityato liṅgrahaṇaṁ nānuvarttiṣyate sijgrahaṇamevānuvarttiṣyata iti sijgrahaṇamanarthakaṁ syāt |
2946:535: ata evopadeśe'janunāsika it ityato laśakvataddhita ityatra idgrahaṇānuvṛttāvapi anunāsikagrahaṇaṁ nānuvarttate ||
2946:538: gāṅkuṭādi sūtre'nunyāsakāreṇoktamādeśapakṣe idgrahaṇamanarthakamāderhi bhavato laśakvataddhita ityanenaivetsaṁjñāyāḥ siddhatvādityādi |
2946:539: rakṣitena tūktamādibhūto ṅakāro laśakvataddhita ityatropadeśagrahaṇānuvṛtterasatīdityetasminnetsaṁjñaka iti na jñāpakamidityetadādeśābhāvasyeti |
2946:541: laśakvataddhita ityatrāsatyupadeśādhikāre niśśabdātsaptamībahuvacane nicśvityatra śakārasyetsaṁjñ syāt |
2946:544: riṅśayagliṅkṣu iti nirddeśācca sāmānyenetsañjñāyāṁ karttavyāyāmasiddhatvāpravarttanasya jñāpitatvāt |
2946:545: tathā bhiyaḥ kruklukanau iti bholuka ityatra klukanaḥ kakāre lupte lakārasyetsañjñā syāt |
2946:548: svarastu na prayojanaṁ nittvādeva tasya siddhatvāt |
2946:549: evaṁ tarhi yaṅluki bebhīluka ityatra svaraḥ prayojanam |
2946:559: yadi vā lakārasyetsañjñāyāṁ yaṇādeśe kṛte bebhyuka ityeka evājiti kva litsvaraḥ syāt |
2946:560: nicśviti jastvena śakārasya jakāraḥ ścutvena sakārasya śakāraḥ svari ca iti cartvaṁ jakārasya cakāraḥ |
2946:561: nanu stoścunā ścuḥ ityatra rakṣitenoktaṁ jhalāṁ jaś jhaśi iti nirddeśāt śakārasya jaśtvaṁ nāsti |
2946:562: ata eva masjinaśorjhali ityatra majjatisiddhaye jaśtvena sakārasya dakārastasya bhṛjjati iti nirdeśādasiddhatvābhāvāt ścutvena jakāro nyāse uktaḥ |
2946:563: anyathā ścutvena sakārasya śakāre kṛte jastvena jakāre siddhe bhṛjjati iti nirddeśādasiddhatvābhāvapravarttanamayuktam |
2946:564: evaṁ ca kathamatra jaśtvena śakārasya jakāraḥ |
2946:566: jhalāṁ jaś jhaśi ityatra cavargaparasya śakārasya jaśtvābhāvādanyatrāpi cavargaparasyaiva jaśtvābhāvastulyajātīyatvāditi yathā kathaṁ cit jñāpakasiddhaṁ na sarvatreti vā ||
2946:571: anyathā sarveṣāmuṇādīnāṁ dhātujatvena kṛdantatvāt prātipadikasaṁjñāsiddhau tanna kuryāt |
2946:572: anye tvataḥ kṛkami ityatra kamigrahaṇaṁ kṛttvā kaṁsagrahaṇādetāmāhuḥ |
2946:573: tena kṛgṛkuṭividibhidibhyaśca iḥ kiditīkārapratyayāntayoḥ kirigiriśabdayorosi yaṇādeśe kṛte dhātutvābhāvāddhali ca iti dīrghatvanna bhavati kiryoḥ giryoriti |
2946:576: na cāsti dīrghavidhiṁ prati na sthānivaditi |
2946:579: evaṁ tarhi jīryaterdhātorjīyateḥ krin raśca va iti krin pratyaye ittve raparatve ca rephasya vakāre kṛte jivririti dhātutvābhāvāddīrgho na bhavatīti ||
2946:583: tena bābhravāśca śālaṅkāyanāśca bābhravaśālaṅkāyanaṁ bābhravaśālaṅkāyanā ityekavacanaṁ bahuvacanaṁ copapannaṁ bhavati |
2946:584: yadyeva samāhāhāradvandve'pi vāktvacaṁ śrīsrajam ityatrāpi dvivacanaṁ prāpnoti paśce tathetaretarayogadvandve'pi pakṣe ekavacanaṁ syāt |
2946:586: sarvo dvandva ityanena samāhāradvandvastathetaretarayogadvandvaśca nāpūrvatayā vibhāṣaikavat kriyate kiṁ tarhi nyāyasiddho'nūdyate |
2946:588: cārthe dvandva ityanena cārthe dvandvaḥ kriyate cārthaścetaretarayogaḥ sa eva yadodriktāvayavabhedo bhavati tadāvayavabhedānugamād dvivacanabahuvacane siddhe eva yadā tu tirohitāvayavavivakṣā saṁhatiḥ pradhānamiti yāvat tadā samāhāra iti tatra saṁhatipradhānatvādekavacanamiti |
2946:589: tadevaṁ cārthe eva sarvo dvandvo vibhāṣayaikavadbhavatīti paribhāṣārūpeṇa paṭhyate |
2946:593: kiṁ tu tatprabheda evetaretarayogo na tu samuccayādayaḥ |
2946:595: samuccaya eva yadā yugapadarthābhidhāyināṁ parasparāpekṣāṇāṁ padānāṁ bhavati tadā dvandvaḥ kriyate |
2946:597: nanu yadi cārthaṁ evāyaṁ sarvo dvandva ityādi kimarthaṁ tarhi tiṣyapunarvasvoḥ ityatrā'sya bahuvacanagrahaṇaṁ jñāpanārthaṁ nyāsakṛtābhidhīyate |
2946:598: tiṣya ekaḥ punarvasū ca dvau iti bahutvādbahuvacanaṁ siddhameva ekavacanasya prasaṅga eva nāsti |
2946:599: bahuvacanaprsaṅge eva dvivacanaṁ bhaviṣyati kiṁ bahuvacanasyetyanena |
2946:607: dvandvaśca prāṇitūryasenāṅgānām ityatra samāhāre eva prāṇyaṅgādīnāmiti |
2946:608: prāṇyaṅgādīnāmeva samāhāre nānyeṣāmiti viparītaniyame hi tiṣyapunarvasūnāṁ sarvadā itaretarayoga eva dvandvaḥ syānnasamāhāre |
2946:609: evaṁ ca bahuvacanaprasaṅga eva dvivacanamiti gahuvacanagrahaṇamanarthakaṁ syāt |
2946:610: etacca dvandvaśca prāṇitūrya ityatra prāṇyaṅgādīnāmeva samāhāra ityevaṁ viparītaniyamo nāśrīyate tiṣyapunarvasvornakṣatradvandve bahuvacanasya iti bahuvacanagrahaṇādityādina granthena rakṣitena vyākhyātam |
2946:611: nanvevaṁ dvandvaśca prāṇitūrya iti sūtramanarthakaṁ syāditi |
2946:615: prāṇyaṅgādīnāṁ samāhāra eva dvandvo yathā syāditaretarayogo mābhūditi sūtraprayojanam |
2946:616: nanu kimarthaṁ samāhāra ekavattvaṁ kriyate netaretarayoga evaikavadbhāvaḥ kriyatām |
2946:617: evaṁ ca samāhāradvandvagrahaṇaṁ prayatnapratipādyaṁ na bhavati karyaṁ ca vidhimukhenaiva pravarttate |
2946:619: itaretarayoga evaikavadbhāve satyasthitvacamityatra samāhāralakṣaṇo dvandvāccudaṣahāntātsamāhāra iti ṭac syāt |
2946:620: nanvevamapi pūrvoktaprakāreṇa samāhāra evaikavadvacanaṁ bhavati samāhāraścaika eva |
2946:621: evaṁ caikavaditi vatirnopapadyate na hyeka evaikavadbhabhavati |
2946:627: atha vā nāyaṁ vatiḥ kiṁ tarhi vadervijanto'yamekavaditi |
2946:628: nanu ca tathāpyaśeṣadvandva ekatvāvidhānāt sarvaśabdārtho'ghaṭamānaḥ syāt |
2946:633: anayaiva paribhāṣayā bābhravaśālaṅkāyanaṁ bābhravaśālaṅkāyanā itivat plakṣanyagrodhaṁ plakṣanyagrodhā ityevamādīnāṁ siddhatvāt |
2946:635: siddhe paribhāṣayaikatve vṛkṣādīnāṁ sajātīyaireva dvandva ekavadyathā syāt,
2946:637: tena paśvādīnāṁ vijātīyairdvandva ekavanna bhavatītītaretarayogo'sau dvandvao bhavati |
2946:645: udidvarṇo'ṇuditsavarṇasya iti sthānaprayatnābhyāṁ viśiṣṭameva savarṇaṁ gṛhṇāti na savarṇamātram |
2946:646: tena coḥ kuḥ iti kugrahaṇe hakārasya grahaṇaṁ na bhavati ||
2946:647: jñāpakaṁ cātra na vibhaktau tusmā ityatra tugrahaṇaṁ kṛtvā sakāragrahaṇamiti |
2946:648: ayaṁ ca nyāyasiddha evārthaḥ sukhapratipattyarthaṁ jñāpakenokaḥ |
2946:650: sthānaprayatnābhyāṁ sadṛśasya savarṇasaṁjñā vidhīyamānā takārasakārayoḥ sparśovāṇoḥ prayatnabhedādeva sāvarṇyaṁ nāstīti tat kuto jñāpakam |
2946:651: yata eva sthānaprayatnābhyāṁ sādṛśyāt sāvarṇyamata evāi uṇiti sūtre vṛttikṛtoktam |
2946:654: teṣāṁ sāvarṇyaprasiddyarthamakāra iha śāstre vivṛtaḥ pratijñāyata iti |
2946:657: anunyāsakāreṇa tu vivṛtatamaḥ pratijñāyata iti draṣṭavyamityuktam |
2946:658: anyathā ākārasya vivṛtatamatvādakārasya vivṛtataratvapratijñāne satyapi sāvarṇyaṁ na syāt |
2946:661: tathā ca jājjhalau iti sūtre śakārasya sāvarṇyenāctvābhāvārthaṁ bhāṣyakāreṇoktam |
2946:669: evaṁ ca nā'jhalau ityasyāpi prayojanaṁ na dṛśyate |
2946:672: anyathā eṅaḥ padāntādati ityādau ekāraukārābhyāṁ sāvarṇyādaikāraukārayorapi grahaṇaṁ syāt |
2946:673: rakṣitena tu eṅa ityatra eoṅṅakāreṇa praṭyāhāragrahaṇasāmarthyāt sāvarṇyābhāva uktaḥ |
2946:674: anyathā aikāraukārayorapi grahaṇe eca iti cakāreṇa pratyāhāragrahaṇaṁ kuryāt |
2946:675: kiṁ tvevaṁ yatra svarūpeṇaikāra upādīyate tatra sāvarṇyaṁ syāt |
2946:677: atra ekāreṇa aikārasya grahaṇe sāvarṇyabhāvātkaravāvahāyitītyatrāpi pragṛhyasaṁjñā syāt |
2946:680: yadyevamiṇkoḥ ityatra kathaṁ nyāsakāreṇa dāsyatītyatra ākārahakārayornyūnādhikaguṇayoḥ sāvarṇyāt ṣatvaprāptimuktā vayasyāsu iti nirddeśād vyavasthoktā |
2946:690: vivṛtaṁ karanamūṣmasvarāṇāmityekapade karttavye yadvivṛtaṁ karaṇamūṣmaṇāṁ svarāṇāṁ ceti pṛthak padaṁ kṛtaṁ tataḥ svarāṇāmityasyaivottaratra sūtre sambandha iti |
2946:691: tena svarāpekṣamevākārasya vivṛtatamatvaṁ noṣmāpekṣamata ākārahakārayoṣtulyaprayatnatvād dāsyatītyatra nirddeśāt ṣatvābhāvo yukta evābhihitaḥ |
2946:692: rakṣitena tu iṇkoḥ ityatra nyūnādhikaguṇasyāpi sāvarṇyamuktam |
2946:693: nanu dāsyatītyādāvākārahakārayorajjhaltvānnājjhalau iti sāvarṇyapratiṣedhādeva mūrddhanyo nāsti tatkimiti nirddeśena vyavasthocyate |
2946:695: nājjhalau ityagṛhītasavarṇānāṁ pratiṣedho vaktavya iti vacanāt |
2946:698: nanu kimarthamagṛhītasavarṇanāṁ pratiṣedha ucyate na sāmānyenaiva pratiṣedho'stu tena dāsyatītyādau sāvarṇyābhāvo nājjhalau iti niṣedhādeva sidhyati |
2946:699: tathā khaṭvā hastaḥ kumārī śete ityādāvakaḥ savarṇe dīrghatvābhāvārthamacītyanuvarttanīyaṁ na bhavati |
2946:701: yadi gṛhītasavarṇānāmapi nājjhalau iti pratiṣedhaḥ syāt tat niṁssa ityatra jharo jhari savarṇa iti pakṣe sakāralopo nasyāt |
2946:702: nṛkāreṇācā savarṇasya sakārasya grahaṇāt tasyācthalyupadeśāddhaltvamajjhalornājjhalau iti pratiṣedhāt |
2946:703: na ca lṛkārasakārayornājjhalau iti savarṇasaṁjñāniṣedhaḥ śakyate karttum |
2946:708: evaṁ cātmana eva ātmanā pratiṣedhaḥ kṛtaḥ syāditi |
2946:709: agṛhītasavarṇānāṁ pratiṣedhaśca nājjhalau ityatra savarṇasaṁjñāpratiṣedhavākye savarṇasaṁjñāyā anabhinirvṛttatvena grahaṇakaśāstrasyānabhinirvṛttatvāt |
2946:710: evaṁ hyuktaṁ pūrvaṁ hyapavādāḥ pravarttante paścādutsargā iti ||
2946:716: tatra prakṛtivadbhāvātpadatve tiṅṅatiṅa iti nighātaḥ siddho bhavati |
2946:719: jñāpakaṁ cātra parivyavebhyaḥ kriya ityādau nirddeśe kriāderanukaraṇaśabdasya vibhaktyutpattyarthaṁ prātipadikasaṁjñābhyupagame'pi dhātutvāśrayasyeyaṅādeśasya karaṇam ||
2946:721: na cātra vidyamāno'pīyaṅādeśaḥ paratvād gherṅiti iti guṇena bādhyate iti śakyate vaktum |
2946:722: kṣiya iti nirddeśātparamapi guṇaṁ bādhitvā iyaṅeva bhavati pūrvavipratiṣedheneti rakṣitena vyākhyātatvāt |
2946:723: evaṁ ca kṣiyo ḍhīrghāt ityatra dīghagrahaṇamupapadyate |
2946:724: anyathā hi kṣiya itīyaṅā nirddeśādeva dīrghaparigrahe siddhe dīrghagrahaṇamanarthakaṁ syāt |
2946:728: tadevaṁ kriya ityādau sārthakasyaiva labdhadhātuvyapadeśasya krītyasyānukaraṇam |
2946:730: viparābhyāṁ jeḥ ityādau nirarthakasya varṇasamudāyamātrasyānukaraṇaṁ tatra ca kriyārūpasyārthasyābhāvāddhātusaṁjñaiva nāsti |
2946:731: evaṁ cānukārye eva dhātusaṁjñāyā abhāvādiyaṅādeśo nāsti tadanukaraṇe kā punaḥ kathā |
2946:735: nanu yadi jeriti nirarthakasyānukaraṇaṁ kathaṁ tarhi jayaterdhātorātmane padaṁ bodhyate |
2946:738: nanu yadi prakṛtivadbhāvād dhātukāryamiyaṅ tadā'dhāturiti prātipadikasaṁjñāpratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti |
2946:740: adhāturiti nāyaṁ prasajyapratiṣedho dhātorna bhavatīti kiṁ tarhi paryudāsaḥ |
2946:742: krīprabhṛtayaśca śabdā anukaraṇatvenādhātavaḥ prakṛtivattayā ca dhātava iti dhātvadhātutvāddhātoranya eva bhavanti |
2946:743: tathā ca kṣiyo dīrghāt ityatra kṣiyaḥ svāśrayā prātipadikasaṁjñā bhaviṣyatīti nyā vyākhyātam |
2946:744: atha vā paryudāse'dhāturiti nedaṁ śāstrīyaṁ kāryam tastatkarttavyatāyāṁ na prakṛtivadityatideśaḥ |
2946:745: paryudāse nañityeta ccārthavadadhāturapratyayaḥ prātipadikam ityatra kṣiye dīrghāt ityatra ca rakṣitenoktam |
2946:752: evamapi anukāryasya vācyasya śabdātmakatvādanukaraṇasya vācakasya na tadabhidheyatvamupapadyate |
2946:753: na hi śabdasya śabdāntaraṁ vācyaṁ kiṁ tarhyartha eva |
2946:763: na cānukāryeṣu śabdeṣu dravyasamavāyinī saṁkhyā saṁbhavati |
2946:772: śabādivikaraṇāt prāganudāttaṅita ātmane padam ityādīni niyamaśāstrāṇi tāvadbhavanti tato vikaraṇāḥ |
2946:773: tena nerviśa ityādau vṛttau yaduktamaḍāgamastadbhaktastadgrahaṇena gṛhyata iti tadupapannaṁ bhavati |
2946:776: niyamakāle ca tadaivāḍāgamaḥ prāpnoti nāsāvaḍāgamo niyamenāpasāryate vikaraṇādeva niyamasya balīyastvāt |
2946:778: tadevaṁ niyamāḍāgamayoryugapatprāptau paratvādaḍāgamastato yuktamuktamaḍāgamastadbhaktastadgrahaṇena gṛhyata iti |
2946:779: nanu ca niyamena pravarttamānena vikaraṇo bādhyeta tadbādhakakāḍāgamapravṛttikāle vikaraṇo nityo'ḍāgamāt prāk kasmānna bhavati |
2946:781: yadi vikaraṇī'ḍāgamaṁ bādheta tato niṣpratidvandvī kimiti niyamo vikaraṇaṁ na bādheteti |
2946:782: tathā edhiṣyate aidhiṣṭetyatrānudāttaṅita ātmanepadameva bhavati na parasmaipadamiti |
2946:783: anyathā paratvānnityatvācca vikaraṇeṣu kṛteṣu syādiṣu tairvyavadhānādanudāttaṅidbhya evātmanepadaṁ śeṣādeva parasmaipadamiti niyamo na syāt |
2946:787: lādeśe tu kṛte edhiṣyate ityatra dvayaṁ prāpnoti yak pratyayaḥ syapratyayaśca tatra paratvādyakaiva bhāvyam |
2946:789: kartṛvācini sārvadhātuke śapi prāpte bhāvakarmaṇostu yaki syādayo vidhīyamānāḥ sāmānyena sarveṣāmapavādatvādbādhakā bhavanti ||
2946:790: ayaṁ cārtho vṛdbhyaḥ syasanoḥ ityatra parasmaipadabidhā nena jñāpitaḥ anyathā vṛtu varttana ityevamādīnāṁ syena vyadhāna cādanudāttaṅita ātmanepadam iti niyamo nāstīti sāmānyavihiteṣu tibādiṣu siddhamubhayaṁ vartsyati varttiṣyatai iti kimanena vidhānena |
2946:792: anye tvasmāj jñāpakāt kṛte'pi vikaraṇe niyamaḥ pravarttate iti paribhāṣāmāhuḥ |
2946:793: asmin darśane edhiṣyata ityatra lāvasthāyāmevāntaraṅgatvātsyapratyayena bhavitavyam |
2946:794: tathā'sminneva darśane aupyata auhyata ityatrājāditvādāḍajādīnām ityāḍ bhavati |
2946:795: anyathā hi vikaraṇānniyamasya balīyastve niyamāḍāgamayoḥ saṁpradhāraṇāyāṁ paratvādaḍāgamena bhavitavyam |
2946:796: na cāḍāgamapravṛttikāle nityo vikaraṇaḥ śakyate pravarttayitum |
2946:798: āḍāgamastu niyamena nāpasāryat iti paratvādasau bādhakaḥ prāpnotyeva |
2946:799: tadevaṁ halāditvādaḍāgame kṛte āṭaśca iti vṛddyabhāvādauhyata ityavamādi na sidhyati |
2946:801: atyārdeśasya carttītyeva siddheriti samo gamyādi sūtre vṛttgrantha upapadyate |
2946:802: na hi vikaraṇānniyamabalīyastve śeti vikaraṇe vidhīyamāna ṛcchādeśa ātmanepadātprāgeva bhavate |
2946:803: tathā'sminneva darśane nergadādi sūtre vikaraṇāttasyāḍāgama uktaḥ |
2946:804: anyathā vikaraṇānniyamabalīyastve tatopi paratvādaḍāgame kṛte kathaṁ vikaraṇāntasyāḍāgama upapadyate |
2946:805: atha vikaraṇebhya ityatra nirddeśe bhyasaḥ sakārasya rutve kṛte rukārasyopadeśe'janunāsika it itītsaṁjñā na prāpnoti pūrvatrāsiddham ityasiddhatvāt |
2946:811: haśi ca ityatrānunāsikaviśiṣṭasya rorgrahaṇaṁ yathā syādityevamarthaṁ rorukārasyānunāsikatvapratijñānaṁ syāt |
2946:812: tena taruvanamityatra haśi ca ityutvaṁ na bhavati |
2946:814: na ca vācyaṁ kṛtrimākṛtrimanyāyena sasajuṣo ruḥ ityasyaivottvena bhavitavyam |
2946:818: utvaśāstre sasajuṣo ruḥ ityasyāsiddhatvāttaruvanasyaiva sambhavo netarasya |
2946:820: tathā cottvavidhāvanunāsikaviśiṣṭasya rephasyottve vidhīyamāne punarbhavādau kathamuttvaprāptiḥ |
2946:821: tadevaṁ rephasyānunāsikatve pratijñātavye yadukārasya pratijñānaṁ tatsāmarthyāditsaṁjñā bhaviṣyati |
2946:823: evaṁ sthita eva śāstre rorukāramakṛtvaiva punaranantaroktaprakāreṇeṣṭasiddherukāro'nubandho vyarthaḥ syāt |
2946:825: etacca sasajuṣo ruḥ ityatrokārasyetsaṁjñārthamanunāsikatvaṁ pratijñātamiti vadatā maitreyeṇa pratipāditam |
2946:829: tatra yathā'siddhatvaṁ bādhitvānunāsikapratijñānamuttvaṁ pravarttayati tathetsaṁjñāmapi pravarttayati |
2946:839: vacanadvayamidaṁ vipratiṣedha sūtre vyaktijātipakṣayo phalabhūtaṁ paribhāṣārūpeṇa paṭhyate |
2946:841: vyaktau padārthe pratilakṣyaṁ lakṣaṇasya vyāpārabhedātparyāyeṇa dvāvapi vidhī prāptau |
2946:843: tatra vipratiṣedhe param ityanena vipratiṣedhaviṣayo niyamyate |
2946:852: tenājjaserasuk ityanena paratvādasuki kṛte punaḥ śībhāvo na bhavati |
2946:854: tathā stāt tvamityatra tātaṅaḥ sthānivattvāḍvibhāvo na bhavati |
2946:857: jātau tu padārthe sakṛdekavāraṁ lakṣaṇaṁ pravarttate |
2946:860: tatra vipratiṣedhe paraṁ kāryam ityasya paravidhau vyāpārātpūrvanivṛttāvavyāpāra iti |
2946:867: tena bhinddhakītyatra paratvāddhibhāve kṛte punarakac kriyate |
2946:869: yatra pūrveṇa pravarttamānena parasya bādhā tatra sakṛdgatiparibhāṣā |
2946:870: yatra tu pūrvaṁ pravarttamānaṁ paraṁ na bādhate tatra punaḥ prasaṅgavijñānātsiddhamiti keṣāṁ cinmatam |
2946:872: evaṁ hyakṣī ityatra paratvādī ca dvivacane itīkāre kṛte punarnum syādeva |
2946:874: atha punaḥprasaṅgavijñānādityatra nirddeśe punaḥśabde padatvāśrayaḥ kathaṁ visarjanīyaḥ |
2946:880: tato bahuṣu bahuvacanam ityanena bahuṣvartheṣu bahuvacanamevetyarthaniyamena pratyayasyāniyatatvādavyayebhyaḥ svādayo vidyanta eva |
2946:882: tathāpi tulyajātīyāpekṣayā niyamasya yatra saṁkhyāsti saṁkhyāntaraṁ ca vyāvarttyaṁ tatraiva niyamena bhavitavyam |
2946:883: evaṁ ca saṁkhyāśabdebhyo devadattayajñadattaviti dvandvasamāsācca tathā vanasyāgre'grevaṇaṁ prācīnaṁ grāmādāmrā ityatrānabhidhānāt sarvasubādyabhāvo vācyaḥ |
2946:884: ata eva hi trikapakṣe'pyanekavākyatāṁ svādi sūtre vakṣyati nyāsakāraḥ |
2946:886: atha yadā trika ekavākyatāpakṣastaḍhā kathaṁ svādayaḥ |
2946:889: yadyevaṁ vṛkṣādibhyo'pi na prāpnuvanti tatra yathā vṛkṣādibhyo bahuṣu bahuvacanam ityādinā svādibhiravidyamānā eva saṁkhyādayo'bhidhīyante |
2946:892: pratyāsattyā prātipadikārtha eva yatra saṁkhyādayaḥ prātipadikenānuktāstatra svādibhiḥ saṁkhyādayo'bhidhīyante nānyatra |
2946:893: yathā ajādyataṣṭāp iti striyāmabhidheyāyāṁ vidhīyamānaṣṭāb vṛkṣādibhyo na bhavati |
2946:895: tathā ca bahuvacanamityatra nyāsakṛtoktam avyayādāpsupaḥ iti jñāpakādavyayebhyastu nitsaṁkhyebhyaḥ sāmānyavihitāḥ svādayo vidyanta eveti |
2946:898: astyeva hi tasya viṣayaḥ pralambate svarityādiravakāśaḥ |
2946:899: pralambate svarityatra hi pralambanakriyāpekṣayā svaḥśabdādavaśyamevāpādāne pañcamyā bhavitavyamatastasyā lugarthaṁ saj jñāpakaṁ kathaṁ syāt |
2946:900: tarhi vyaktāvaliṅgasaṁkhyaṁ yadavyayaṁ nīcairityādi tadarthaṁ yatkṛtaṁ taj jñāpakam |
2946:902: prātipadikārthamātre vihitāyāḥ prathāmāyā lugarthaṁ syāt tatkathaṁ jñāpakam |
2946:905: etaccāsamyak avyayād dvitīyādividhānasya na kiṁ citprayojanam |
2946:906: sapūrvāyāḥ prathamāyā vibhāṣā iti vikalpitatemayādividdyabhāvaḥ prayojanamiti cet |
2946:909: evaṁ tarhi dvitīyādyantānāṁ dvitīyādisamāsaḥ prayojanamiti cet |
2946:911: yataḥ pratyāsattyā tatra śritādinimittā dvitīyā samasyate |
2946:920: ata eva saṁkhyārahitebhyopi prathamā siddhetyavyayādāpsupaḥ iti sūtraṁ jñāpakaṁ prapañcatayoktam ||
2946:924: iyaṁ paribhāṣā vipratiṣedha sūtre bhāṣye nyāse ca paṭhitā |
2946:925: tena dyaukāmiḥ sautthitirityādau vibhajyānvākhyānapakṣe bahiraṅgāyā vṛddherdaurbalyādantaraṅgau yaṇekādeśau bhavataḥ |
2946:927: samarthānāṁ prathamādvā ityatra samarthagrahaṇātsamarthitasarvakāryāttadvitena bhavitavyamityevaṁ yaṇekādeśayoḥ siddhatvāt |
2946:928: idaṁ tūdāharaṇaṁ vṛkṣāi ihetyādau bahiraṅgādakaḥ savarṇadīrghādantaraṅgo guṇaḥ |
2946:929: na caitadasiddhaṁ bahiraṅgaḥ mantaraṅgaḥ ityanayā paribhāṣayā sidhyati |
2946:931: nanvevaṁ kṛte'pyatra savarṇadīrghatve'caḥ parasminpūvavidhauṁ iti sthānijadbhāvādāṅguṇena siddhaṁ vṛkṣa iheti |
2946:938: tathāhi yathā asiddhaparibhāṣayā ṣatvatukorasiddha ityasyānarthakatvaṁ tathāntaraṅgaparibhāṣayāpi |
2946:944: yattūcyate nityādapyantaraṅgaṁ balīya iti tatparatvaphalaṁ na tvapūrvamiti |
2946:949: kiṁ ca yadyatrāntaraṅgaparibhāṣāyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ syāttadāntaraṅgaparibhāṣā nirviṣayā syāt |
2946:950: iyaṁ ca paribhāṣā bahiraṅgaparibhāṣayaiva sarvakāryasya siddhatvād bhāgavṛttikṛtā nābhyupagamyate |
2946:951: tanmate vṛkṣa ihetyādāvacorānantarye yadyapi bahiraṅgaparibhāṣā nāsti |
2946:956: anyathā vākyasaṁskāre vṛkṣai ihetyādau śabdaparavipratiṣedhenāntaraṅgamādguṇaṁ bādhitvā sarvaṇadīrghatvameva syāt |
2946:957: yathā diva ut ityatra divokamo devā ityatra ukārasya yṇādeśo rakṣitenotkaḥ |
2946:959: evaṁ hi divokasa ityatrāpi ikārasya yaṇādeśaḥ syāt |
2946:962: atra ghas, tasya iyādeśe kṛte siti ca iti padasaṁjñāntaraṅgatvādajādau vidhīyamānāṁ bahiraṅgāṁ yaci bham iti bhasaṁjñāṁ bādhate |
2946:966: siti ca iti sūtrārambhādeva bhasaṁjñābādhakatvasya siddhatvāt |
2946:969: svādiṣviti padasaṁjñayā yaci bham iti bhasaṁjñāyāḥ samāveśe siddhe siti ca iti kṛtaṁ yadi punaḥ samāveśaḥ syāttadā siti ca ityanarthakameva syāt |
2946:971: yaci bham ityatraikasaṁjñādhikārābhyupagamād bhapadasaṁjñayoḥ samāveśo nāsti |
2946:972: evaṁ ca siti ca ityatrāsatyekasaṁjñādhikāre ṛtviya ityatra bhapadasaṁjñayoḥ samāveśaḥ syādeva |
2946:979: ayaṁ te yonirṛtviya ityatra padasaṁjñā bhasaṁjñā bādhata iti |
2946:986: yatra pañcamīnirddeśo'sti saptamīnirddeśaścopātto'nuvṛtto vā tatra pañcamīnirddeśasya balīyastvāttasmādityuttarasya iti pravarttate |
2946:987: tenāmi sarvanāmnaḥ suṭ ityatrāt ityanuvṛttau avarṇāntātsarvanāmna ityanayā pañcamyā āmītyasyāḥ saptamyāḥ ṣaṣṭhyāṁ parikalpitāmāma eva suḍāgamo bhavati |
2946:988: ayaṁ ca vipratiṣedhe paraṁ kāryam ityasyārthaḥ paribhāṣārūpeṇa paṭhyate |
2946:990: tasminniti nirddiṣṭe pūrvasya iti saptamīnirddeśa iko yaṇaci iti dadhyatra madhvantretyatra sāvakāśaḥ |
2946:991: tasmādityuttarasya iti pañcamīnirddeśo raṣābhyāṁ no ṇa ityatra kṛtārthaḥ |
2946:993: yatra tu saptamīnirddeśaḥ pañcamīnirddeśaścobhayaṁ kṛtārthaṁ tatrobhayaprāptau paratvāttasmādityuttarasya iti pravarttate |
2946:995: āmi sarvanāmnaḥ suṭ ityatrāt iti pañcamī ājjaserasuk ityatrāsugvidhau kṛtārthā |
2946:998: yatra tvanavakāśā saptamī tatra saptamīnirddeśa eva pañcamyāḥ ṣaṣṭītvaṁ kalpayati |
2946:999: yathā''ne muk ityatra''na iti saptamī niravakāśāto yeyaḥ ityatrāta iti kṛtārthāyāḥ pañcamyāḥ ṣaṣṭhītvaṁ kalpayati |
2946:1001: yadyeva ḍaḥ si ghūṭ ityatra kathamanayā sakārādeḥ parasya dhuḍāgamaḥ |
2946:1002: na hi sītyasyāḥ saptamyāḥ kvāpi kṛtārthatvam |
2946:1004: yathā sītyasyāḥ saptamyā anavakāśatvaṁ tathā ḍa ityasyā api pañcamyāḥ |
2946:1014: etacca ḍaḥ si dhuṭ ityatra nyāse uktam |
2946:1015: iha tu dīrghātpadāntādvā ityatra yadyapi cha iti saptamī kṛtārthā,
2946:1016: tathāpi tasyāḥ svaritāsaṅgādihānuvṛttāyā niravakāśatvāddīrghādityasyāḥ pañcamyāḥ ṣaṣṭhītvaṁ prakalpayati |
2946:1017: pañcamī tu paurvāparyaṁ prakalpya sāvakāśā nivarttate |
2946:1019: dīrghāduttaro yaśchākārastasminparataḥ pūrvasyaiva dīrghasya tugbhavati tatrāsyā na vyāpāra iti tasmādityuttarasya ityatra nyāsaḥ |
2946:1020: dīrghāt ityatra tu nyāsakṛtā tasmādityuttarasyetyatra tasmāditi yogavibhāgaḥ karttavyaḥ |
2946:1022: tena dīghāt ityādau satyapi pañcamīnirddeśe pūrvasyaiva kāryaṁ bhavatītyuktam ||
2946:1026: tana dhuri dakṣiṇāyāmityatrārthe saptamyā vikalpitatvāccheṣe ṣāṣṭhīvidhānāddhuri dakṣiṇāyā iti sidhyati |
2946:1027: tathā ye yūpāya takṣatītyatra takṣatīti bahutve ekavacanam |
2946:1028: ayaṁ cārthaḥ ṣaṣṭhīyuktaśchandasi vā ityatra yogavibhāgena sādhitaḥ |
2946:1029: iyaṁ ca paribhāṣā vyatyayo bahulamityasyaiva prapañcaḥ ||
2946:1033: pratyaye gṛhyemāṇe yasmādasau vihitastadādereva bhāgasya tatpratyayāntasya ca grahaṇaṁ bhavati |
2946:1035: sanādyantā dhātavaḥ iti yasmātman vihitastadādestadantasyaiva dhātusaṁjñā |
2946:1047: taddhitavidhau yañiñośca iti pratyayayorgrahaṇaṁ yatastau vihitau tadādereva phak pratyayo bhavati |
2946:1053: sa cāyamartho yasmātpratyayavidhi sūtre yogavibhāgena sādhitaḥ |
2946:1057: pratyaye gṛhyamāṇe yasmāt vihitastadādireva ghiyate na tu pratyayāntaḥ saṁghāta iti |
2946:1058: ata evāṅgapāde yasmādādi sūtraṁ kṛtvā aṅgasya iti sūtraṁ na khaṇḍyate |
2946:1061: kiṁ tu na strīpratyaye cānuparjane iti dvitīyā na sidhyati |
2946:1065: pradhāne ca kāryasaṁpratyayānna strīpratyaye cānupasarjane iti labhyate |
2946:1073: tena dviḥ prayogo dvirvacanamiti pakṣe tadādigrahaṇāt pacasipacasi iti samudāyasya suptiṅantaṁ padam iti padasaṁjñā sidhyati |
2946:1075: artharūpayoḥ sāmyāt sa eva pacśabdaḥ sa eva tiṅ yaḥ pūrvasmādvihitaḥ sa eva parasmādapi vihitaḥ yaḥ parasmādapavihitaḥ sa pūrvasmādapitī tadādigrahaṇāt samudāyasya padatvam |
2946:1076: tasya ca padatve āpacasipacasi devadattā ityatrāma ekāntaramāmantritamanantike ityekāntaratā siddhā bhavati |
2946:1077: etacca sarvasya dve ityatra bhāṣyavyākhyānaṁ rakṣitenoktam |
2946:1081: yatha samudāyasyāvayavānāṁ caikāctve samudāyasya dvirvacanaṁ bhavati nā vayavānāṁ papāceti |
2946:1084: avayavayostu padasaṁjñāyāṁ samudāyasya tyāgāttadviṣayaṁ śāstraṁ hīnaṁ syāt |
2946:1086: atra tu pakṣe andho'ndho duḥkhītyādau pratyekaṁ padatvābhāve padakāryaṁ na syāt |
2946:1087: tadarthaṁ pratyekaṁ vākyaparisamāptyā tatre padatve padakāryamanusandheyam |
2946:1088: anyastvāha gaurībhyāmityatra gurusaṁjñāyāṁ guroranuta iti plutaḥ syāt |
2946:1096: na cāsmin pakṣe lakṣmīprabhṛtiṣu strītvābhāvānnadīsaṁjñā na prāpnotīti vācyam |
2946:1099: tathā cācchīnadyornum ityatra śīnadyoḥ parata iti vṛttāvuktaṁ tadevaṁ varṇapakṣe doṣaḥ |
2946:1105: yeyaṁ pratyayagrahaṇaparibhāṣā sā strīpratyaye'nupasarjane grāhikā na bhavati |
2946:1108: tena strībhyo ḍhak iti yato'ṇ tadantātkāraśabdān ṅīp |
2946:1112: nanvaṇantān ṅīb vidhīyamānaḥ kṛdgrahaṇaparibhāṣayā kumbhakāraśabdādeva bhaviṣyati |
2946:1116: nanu pratyayagrahaṇaparibhāṣāyā abhāvādyathā strīpratyayāntāḍ ḍhagvidhīyamānaḥ kumbhakārītyasmātsamudāyaśabdādbhavati tathā kāraśabdādapi kva citsyāt |
2946:1119: tathā ṣyaṅaḥ saṁprasāraṇam ityatra ṣyaṅaḥ stryadhikāre vidhānāt strītvaṁ,
2946:1121: atastadgrahaṇe pratyayagrahaṇaparibhāṣāyā niṣedhāt ṣyaṅmātrasya saṁprasāranaṁ paramakārīṣagandhīputra iti |
2946:1122: anupasarjana iti pratiṣedhādupasarjane strīpratyaye pratyayagrahaṇaparibhāṣā pravarttata eva |
2946:1124: nanvevamapi pradhāne kāryasaṁpratyayātpradhānapratyayagrahaṇa eva pratyayagrahanaparibhāṣayā bhavityam |
2946:1125: evaṁ cātikārīṣagandhyaputra ityatra saṁprasāranaṁ syādeva ucyate |
2946:1126: yadyatra saṁprasāraṇaṁ syāttadānupasarjana iti pratiṣedho'narthakaḥ syāt |
2946:1127: nanvevamapyardhapippalītyatrāpi pratyayagrahaṇaparibhāṣayā halṅyādinā sulopo na prāpnoti |
2946:1131: ato na strīpratyaya iti tadāditadantaniyamaniṣedho bhavatyeva |
2946:1133: laukikaṁ yadupasarjanaṁ tasminsati na strīpratyaya iti pravarttituṁ notsahate |
2946:1138: pañcakhaṭvītyatra samudāyibhyo'nyaḥ samudāya ityetasmindarśane śāstrīyopasarjanasaṁjñābhāve'pi laukikamupasarjanamāśritya gostriyorupasarjanasya iti hrasvamuktā dvigoḥ iti ṅībuktaḥ |
2946:1140: ekavibhakti cāpūrvanipāte ityatrānuvṛttavibhāṣāgrahaṇasya vyavasthitavibhāṣāvijñād yathārdhapippalītyatra śāstrīyopasarjanābhāvena laukikopasarjanāśrayaṁ hrasvatvaṁ na bhavati |
2946:1142: atha vā halaṅyādi sūtre dīrghagrahaṇāt kva cidupasarjanastrīpratyaye'pi na strīpratyaye ityevātra varttata ityāhuḥ |
2946:1145: yāvatā vipakṣe he amba he nadi ityatra sulopo mābhūdityevamarthaṁ dīrghagrahaṇaṁ karttavyam |
2946:1147: na ca dīrghagrahaṇātte nāpi na bhavitavyamiti vācyam |
2946:1148: anyathā hi halṅyādi sūtre dīrghagrahaṇameṅhrasvāt iti sūtraṁ cākṛtvā hrasvaiṅoraṅyāpaḥ saṁbuddheriti kuryāt |
2946:1149: ata eveha he amba he nadi ityādau sulopo na bhaviṣyatīti |
2946:1150: nanvevamapi badaryāḥ phalaṁ vikāra iti tasya vikāra ityarthe'nudāttādeśca ityañaḥ phale luk iti luki luk taddhitaluki iti ṅīpo'pi luki kṛte'sati dīrghagrahaṇe pratyayagrahaṇena badaramityatra sulopaḥ syāt sa mābhūditi sārthakaṁ dīrghagrahanam |
2946:1157: tena taraptamapaughaḥ iti tarammātrasya ghasaṁjñāyāṁ gharūpakalpa iti ghe hrasva ucyamānastarapi bhavati |
2946:1160: tathā ktaktavatū niṣṭhā iti ktaktavatvoreva niṣṭhāsaṁjñā |
2946:1162: tena dṛṣattīrṇetyatra dṛṣado dakārātparasya natvābhāvo dakārasya ca pūrvasyeti |
2946:1164: hrasvavidhau tu ghānte evottarapade hrasvatvena bhāvyam |
2946:1166: hṛdayasya hallekhayadaṇlāseṣu ityatrāṇgrahaṇaṁ kṛtvā lekhagrahaṇāddhrasvavidhāvapi na tadantavidhiḥ |
2946:1167: radābhyām iti natva vidhāvapo saṁjñāvidhau tadantavidhipratiṣedhasāmarthyādeva na tadantavijñānam |
2946:1170: yadi saṁjñāvidhau tadantavidhi pratiṣedhasya taraptabvidhāveva prayojanaṁ tadā suptiṅantaṁ padam ityatrāntagrahaṇamakṛtvā saṁjñāvidhau pratyayagrahaṇe tadantavidhirnāstītyapyajñāpayitvā taraptamapau pitau gha iti kriyatām |
2946:1171: ayaṁ cārthaḥ pitau taraptamapau ghasaṁjñau bhavata iti |
2946:1173: atha vā natvavidhau pratyayagrahaṇaparibhāṣā nāsti niṣṭhāśabdasya takāraviśeṣaṇatvenopādānāt |
2946:1174: kṛttaddhitasamāsāśca ityatra kṛttaddhitagrahaṇena tadantasyaiva saṁjñā na tatrayamupatiṣṭhate |
2946:1175: yato'pratyaya iti pratiṣedhe prāpte kṛttaddhitayoḥ saṁjñā''rabhyate |
2946:1176: apratyaya iti ca pratyayāntasya pratiṣedha ityuktam |
2946:1177: tena tadantasya pratiṣedhe prāpte saṁjñā''rabhyamāṇā tadantasyaiva bhavati |

2946:1190: yatra prātipadikaṁ gṛhyate tatra liṅgaviśiṣṭasya ṅyābantasyāpi grahaṇaṁ bhavati |

2946:1200: ṭhagutpatteḥ prāgeva bhasyāḍhe taddhita iti puṁvadbhāvāt |
2946:1201: na ca jāteśca iti puṁvadbhāvapratiṣedho'sti yata aupasaṁkhyānikasya tena pratiṣedho na kriyate |

2946:1204: tena jāteśca ityaupasaṁkhyānikasya pratiṣedho na bhavatīti tatra nyāse vyākhyātam |
2946:1206: anyathā sthite'pi hāstikamityatra bhasyāḍha ityasya jāteśca iti pratiṣedhāt puṁvadbhāvo na syāt |
2946:1207: atha bhasyāḍha ityatra taddhita iti prasaptamī na viṣayasaptamīti cenna |

2946:1210: anyathā hi tipratyayāntasya yuvatiśabdasyānudāttāditvādanudāttāderañ ityañbādhanārthaḥ syāt |
2946:1213: ye parasaptamīmāśrityānudāttādeśca ityañbādhanārthameva bhikṣādibhyoṇ ityatra yuvatiśabdasya pāṭhamicchanti |
2946:1215: ata eva bhāgavṛttikāro yuvatīnāṁ samūho yauvanimityāha |
2946:1218: yasya puṇyakṛtaḥ preṣyaṁ saphalaṁ tasya jīvita“ miti |
2946:1219: etasminneva darśane ṅyāp sūtre rakṣitenāsyāḥ paribhāṣāyā hastinīnāṁ samūho hāstikamityudāharanamuktam |
2946:1220: jñāpakaṁ cāsyā bhāṣyakāreṇa yuvā khalatipalitabalinajaratībhiḥ ityatra samānādhikaraṇādhikāre yuvajaratyoḥ samāsavidhānamuktam |
2946:1221: anyathā yadyeṣā na syāttadā'nayoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyānupapatteḥ samāso'ghaṭamānaḥ syāt |
2946:1223: nanu satyapi paribhāṣāyā astitve yuvatijaratyorbhinnārthatvādanupapanna eva samāsaḥ |
2946:1229: jaratī vā yuvatiriva cāñcalyāditi yuvatijaratyoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyamasti |

2946:1241: prayojanaṁ cāpi revatījagatīhaviṣyābhyaḥ praśasye ityatra jagatīgrahaṇena jagato'pi grahaṇamiti |
2946:1242: tathaiva eṇyā ḍhañ ityatra ṇīgrahaṇena ṇasyāpi grahaṇamiti |

2946:1245: nanvevamapi jaratyā samāsa ucyamāno jaratā na prāpnoti yuvajaranniti |
2946:1248: ubhayathā hyācāryeṇa śiṣyāḥ pratipāditā ityubhayaṁ sidhyatīti yuvakhalatītyatra nyāsaḥ |
2946:1256: tena yathā rauṇa ityatrāṇ bhavati tathā''jakarauṇa ityatrāpi |
2946:1259: evaṁ tarhi taj jñāpayatyasvarūpavidhiviṣaye paribhāsā pravarttata iti |
2946:1260: tena kumārīmācaṣṭe kumārayatītyasya siddhaye bahulavacanaṁ nātikliśyate |
2946:1263: tenānmahata ityādinā mahatīpriya ityatrāttvaṁ na bhavati |
2946:1264: dviṣatparayostāpeḥ ityatra tu dviṣatīṁ tāpayatītyatra dvitakārakanirddeśāt khacpratyayābhāvo vṛttikṛtā vyākhyātaḥ |
2946:1265: rājāhaḥsakhibhyaṣṭac ityatrāpi rājaśabdasyāpi pūrvanipātakaraṇānmahārājñītyatra ṭacpratyayābhāvo vṛttāvuktaḥ |
2946:1266: prātipadikagrahaṇe ityatra ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaḥ sa ca samarthaḥ padavidhiḥ ityetatparibhāṣosthānād bhavati |
2946:1274: tatra karmasādhanagrahaṇe tatropapadaṁ saptamīstham ityatropapadamiti mahatyāḥ saṁjñāyāḥ karaṇaṁ jñāpakam |
2946:1275: tathāhi anvarthasaṁjñeyaṁ mahatī uapapadamiti tena samarthaparibhāṣopasthānāt mahāntaṁ kumbhaṁ karotītyatra sāpekṣatvenāsāmarthyātkarmaṇyaṇpratyayo na bhavati |
2946:1285: tatrādhikaraṇe kipratyayo nāstīti yaduktaṁ tadayuktaṁ yasmāt padaśabde karmaṇyupapade karmaṇyadhikaraṇe ca iti lyuḍapavādaḥ kipratyo'styeva |
2946:1287: yathā kevalaṁ vidhiśabdamupakramya nyāsakṛtoktaṁ maitreyeṇāpi tathā vidhānādadoṣaḥ |
2946:1289: tatra karmopapadatvābhāvāt karmaṇyadhikaraṇe ca ityasya na prāptiḥ |
2946:1290: nanu tathāpyuttarakālaṁ padaśabdasya karmaṇo'bhisaṁbandhāt kipratyayaviṣayo'yamiti parihṛtyāpavādaviṣayamutsargo'bhiniviśata iti lyuṭ pravarttinuṁ notsahate |

2946:1296: kipratyayasya tu karmopapadasaṁbandhena vidhānāt sarvadā vākyasaṁskāra eva yukta ityāhuḥ ||
2946:1303: yuvatīḥ paśyetyatra śvayuvamaghonāmataddhhita iti saṁprasāraṇaṁ na bhavati |

2946:1306: anyathā yadyanayā paribhāṣayā saṁprasāraṇābhāvo vijñāyate tadā yuvatśabāt kṛdikārāditi ṅiṣi kṛte yuvatītyatra saṁprasāraṇaṁ syādeva |
2946:1307: iyaṁ ca paribhāṣā yuvoranākau ityatra bhāṣye paṭhitā |
2946:1315: tena karmaṇā yamabhipraiti ityatra yamiti pulliṅgenaikavacanena ca nirddeśasyātantratvāt liṅgāntare vacanāntare ca saṁjñā bhavati |
2946:1321: dyadbhyo luṅi ityatra tvekavacanena nirddeśe karttavye yadbahuvacanaṁ tatsāmarthyānneyaṁ pravarttate ||
2946:1328: evaṁ cānyaditi prathamāntapratirūpako nipāto'nyasminnityarthe varttata iti vijñeyam |
2946:1340: kṣiatriyārthe upacarito yo brāhmaṇaśabdastena saha nañ samasyate na brāhmaṇo'brāhmaṇa iti |
2946:1341: ata eva tatra nañā mukhyādarthādvyavacchidya gauṇe'rthe vyavasthāpyate |
2946:1342: yathā nīlaṁ ca tadutpalaṁ ceti nīlotpalamiti nīlaguṇetaraguṇebhyo vyavacchidya nīlaguṇamutpalaṁ vyavasthāpyate |
2946:1344: kevalaḥ prayukto'yaṁ brāhmaṇaśabdo mukhyamevārthaṁ gamayati prasiddhivaśāt |
2946:1351: bhramavaśād dvitvādāvarthe loke ekārthasyopacaritasya nañsaṁnidhau gamyamānatvaṁ dṛśyate |
2946:1352: tathā cāropitaikatvasyārthasyābhidhāna ekaśabda upāttaḥ svasaṁkhya eva |
2946:1354: yadā tu yatrādvitvādāvarthe dvitvamāropitaṁ tadbhedaścāśrīyate tadā tadvacanabhedaḥ |
2946:1355: yathā dyudbhyo luṅi vṛdbhyaḥ syasanoḥ iti |
2946:1356: evaṁ ca kṛtvā anekeṣāmityādayaḥ prayogāḥ sidhyanti |
2946:1363: nanu nañsamāsavidhau ñakāro na karttavyo na hyanyo naśabdo'sti vyadvyavacchedāya ñakāropādānamiti |

2946:1374: nanu kathaṁ ṣaṣṭhyantasya nañśabdasya ṣaṣṭhī ityanenaiva samāso'bhidhīyate |

2946:1378: athāpyanalvidhāvityatra vidhigrahaṇādviśeṣo'pyatidiśyata evamapi tatra śrūyamāṇavibhaktyarthāt sthagrahaṇādvibhaktyabhāve nasādeśo nāstyeva |

2946:1389: supsupā ityadhikāre'pi kugatiprādayaḥ kartṛkaraṇe kṛtā bahulam upapadamatiṅ iti ca gatīnāṁ kārakāṇāmupapadānāṁ ca yo'yaṁ samāsaḥ sa subutpatte prāgeva veditavyaḥ |

2946:1391: yadi tu subantena samāsaḥ syāttadā supaḥ prāgantaraṅgatvāṭṭāpsyāt |
2946:1392: evaṁ cādantatvābhāvātpuṁyogādākhyāyām iti ṅīṣ na syāt |
2946:1393: tathā'śvadhanaśabdayośca labdhakaraṇavyapadeśayoḥ kṛdantenaiva krītaśabdena kartṛkaraṇe kṛtā bahulam iti samāsaḥ |

2946:1396: tathā ca kacchapaśabdasyādantatvāt kacchapīti jāteḥ iti ṅīṣ bhavati |
2946:1398: nanu kṛdantaiḥ samāsaṁ kṛtvā strīpratyayaḥ kimarthaṁ pratipādyate yāvatā kṛtpratyayotpattyanantarakāla eva samāsāttannimittabhūtācca supastato'pyantaraṅgatvāt strīpratyayācca prāgeva puṁyogādākhyāyām ityādyairvākyaiḥ strīpratyaye kriyamāṇe praṣṭhī aśvakrītītyādi siddhyati |
2946:1400: evaṁ hi praṣṭhādisamudāyasyākṛdantatvena prātipadikatvābhāvattatsamudāyāt strīpratyayo na śakyate kartum |
2946:1402: kṛttaddhitasamāsāśca ityatra kṛdgrahaṇena kṛdgrahaṇe gatikārakapūrvasyāpi grahaṇamiti kṛdgrahaṇaparibhāṣayā samudāyasya prātipadikatvamastyeva |

2946:1405: ata eva tadviṣaye kṛdgrahaṇena kṛdantasya saṁjñā na tu kṛdgrahaṇaparibhāṣayā gatikārakapūrvasyāpi |
2946:1406: yadi syāttadā mūlakenopadaṁśaṁ bhuṅkte iti tṛtīyāprabhṛtīnyatarasyām iti samāsābhāvapakṣe'pi tṛtīyāyā luk syāt |
2946:1407: na ca vācyamevaṁ hi vikalpena samāsavacanamanarthakaṁ syāt |
2946:1411: kiṁ ca yadi samāsātprāk strīpratyayaḥ syāt tadā prabhāvinī prabhaviṇītyatra ṅyantasyottarapadasyānto nakāro na bhavatīti prātipadikāntanumvibhaktiṣu ca iti pakṣe ṇatvaṁ na syāt |
2946:1414: tena carmakrīti carmakārītyatra subantatvātpadanibandhano nalopaḥ sidhyati |
2946:1416: pramāṇaṁ cātra tatpuruṣe kṛti bahulam iti saptamyā alumvidhānam |
2946:1418: nanu yadyuttarapade vibhaktirna bhavati tarhi tasya padatvaṁ na syāt |
2946:1419: tataścottarapadavyapadeśābhavāduttarapade parato vidhīyamāno'luk sarasijamityatra na syāt |
2946:1421: samāsāvayavasya hi parasya bhāgasya rūḍhyottarapadavyapadeśaḥ svīkriyate |
2946:1424: anyathā satyapi subantānāṁ samāsa uttarapadatve cāpadādividhāviti vacanāt kvāpyuttarapadatvaṁ na syāt |
2946:1427: supsupā ityadhikārāttiṅantena samāsasaṁbhava eva nāsti kimatiṅgrahaṇena |
2946:1428: kṛtaṁ ca taj jñāpayatyetayoryogayoḥ supsupā iti nābhisambadhyate |
2946:1429: tena gatikārakopapadanāṁ kṛdbhiḥ samāsavacanaṁ prāk subutpatterityupapannaṁ bhavati |
2946:1430: nanu yadi gatyādīnāṁ supaḥ prāk subantena śabdāntareṇa samāsastadā dhātūpasargasamudāyasyāpi syāt |
2946:1433: pūrvaṁ dhātuḥ śādhanena yujyata ityetasmindarśana idaṁ samādheyam |
2946:1436: gatikārakopapadānāṁ kṛdbhireva samāso bhavati sa ca prāk subutpatterityekorthaḥ |
2946:1437: gatikārakopapadānāmaviśeṣeṇa samāso bhavati kṛdbhistu prāk subutpatteriti dvitīyaḥ |
2946:1439: ke cittu subantenaiva gatyādīnāṁ kṛdbhiḥ kva citsamāsamāhuḥ |
2946:1442: tena so'padādau iti satvaṁ na bhavati |
2946:1443: uraśśabdasya subantena kapratyayāntena samāse kṛte kakārasya padāditvāt so'padādau iti visarjanīyasya satvaṁ na bhavatīti |
2946:1445: tathāhi yadyapi subantena samāsastathāpi satvena bhavitavyam |
2946:1449: uttarapadatve cāpadādividhāviti yo'yaṁ pratyayalakakṣaṇapratiṣedhaḥ sa so'padādā iti pratiṣedhe karttavye na pravarttate |
2946:1450: gatikārakopapadānāmityasya prāyikatvaṁ so'padādau ityatra pratyayalakṣaṇapratiṣedhāpravarttanaṁ ca bhāskārāntetyatra satvanipātanādavasitam |
2946:1452: gatikārakopapadānāmiti kṛtvā yadi supaḥ prāk samāsaḥ |
2946:1453: tadā bhāskara ityatra uttarapadatvābhāvādeva so'padādau iti satvaṁ siddham |
2946:1454: athāsyāḥ paribhāṣayāḥ prāyikatvādbhāskara ityatra subantayoreva samāsastathāpyuttarapadatve cāpadādividhāviti pratyayalakṣaṇapratiṣedhena padatvābhāvātsopadādau iti satvaṁ siddhaṁ syāt |
2946:1458: nanvevaṁ yadā supaḥ prāk samāsastadā kakārasyāpadāditvādayaḥkrītītyatra so'padādau iti satvaṁ syāt |
2946:1461: atha vā so'padādau ityatra pāśakalpakakāmyeṣviti parigaṇanānna bhavati |
2946:1463: bhāskārāntetyatra yatsatvanipātanaṁ tatsāmarthyāduttarapade satvaṁ na bhavatītyevāstu |
2946:1464: tata evāyaḥkrītītyādau satvābhāvaḥ siddha iti pāśakalpakakāmyeṣviti parigaṇanamanarthakameveti ||
2946:1470: tena kāñcanī vāsayaṣṭiriti nityaṁ vṛddhaśarādibhya iti mayaṭo viṣaye'nudattādeśca ityañ bhavati |

2946:1473: samarthānāṁ prathamadvā ityato vanuvṛtteriño'bhāvapakṣe tasyāpatyam ityaṇā dāśarathāyeti siddham |
2946:1475: yatrotsargo vibhāṣā'pavādo'pi tatrāpavādenavinirmukte viṣaya utsargo na pravarttate |
2946:1479: jñāpakaṁ cātra kaṭaṁ kārako vrajatītyatrākenorbhāviṣyaḍhādhamarṇyayoḥ iti bhaviṣyadakaprayoge karmaṇi ṣaṣṭhīniṣedhavidhānam |
2946:1480: taddhi yadyaṇ karmaṇi ca ityapavādaviṣaye tumunṇvalau kriyāyāṁ kriyārthāyam ityutsargaḥ pravarttate tadopapadyate nānyathā |
2946:1481: nanu vāsarūpavidhinā'ṇ karmaṇi ca ityapavādaviṣaye ṇvulapi siddha eva |
2946:1485: ṇvultṛcau iti ṇvuli siddhe punastumunṇvulau kriyāyām iti lṛṭ śeṣe ca iti viṣaye ṇvulo vidhānādavagamyate |
2946:1486: anyathā vā'sarūpavidhinaiva lṛḍviṣaye ṇvulaḥ siddhatvātpunastanna kuryāt |
2946:1487: kṛtaṁ cāto'vasīyate'sminviṣaye vāsarūpavidhinā tṛjādayo na bhavantīti |
2946:1489: asti ca tumunṇvulau kriyāyām ityasya prayojanaṁ bhaviṣyatkāle ṇvul yathā syāt |
2946:1490: tenākenorbhaviṣyadādharmaṇyayoḥ ityatra bhaviṣyadadhikāravihitasyākasya grahaṇād varṣaśatasya pūrakaḥ putrapautrāṇāṁ darśaka ityatra ṣaṣṭhīniṣedho na bhavati |
2946:1492: bhaviṣyatkāle vihitasyākasya tatra gṛhaṇādiha doṣo nāstīti jñāpakavādino'bhiprāyaḥ |
2946:1494: varṣaśatasya pūraka ityatra pūraka iti padaṁ na bhaviṣyatkāle |
2946:1496: ata eva gatyarthakarmaṇi dvitīyācarturthyau ceṣṭāyāmanadhvani ityatra dvitīyāgrahaṇaṁ kriyate |
2946:1498: cakārakaraṇasāmarthyātkṛdyogalakṣaṇā ṣaṣṭhī na bhaviṣyati grāmaṁ gantā grāmāya gantā |
2946:1504: caturthyapi siddhā saṁpradāna ityeva na sidhyati |
2946:1506: na ca karmaṇātra grāmamabhipraiti kiṁ tarhi kriyayā |
2946:1511: tathā śobhanaṁ grāmaṁ gacchatīti kriyāviśeṣaṇasya karmatvaṁ na syāt |
2946:1512: grāmāya gamyata iti cākarmakatvādbhāve lakāraḥ syāt |
2946:1517: tadaiva ca bhāve lakārābhāvādgrāmāya gamyata iti na bhavati |
2946:1520: gatyārthādi sūtre sati prārthanādhyavasānādikriyābhedena karmabhūtāyā gatikriyāyā viśeṣaṇatvācchobhanasya karmatvena kriyāgrahaṇaṁ karttavyamityasyāsarvaviṣayatvācchobhanaṁ grāmaṁ gacchatīti bhavati |

2946:1523: tatyarthādi sūtrābhāve tu grāmāya gacchatīti siddhaye kriyāgrahaṇaṁ karttavyamityanena saṁpradānatvaṁ vaktavyam |
2946:1524: asya cārthaṁ kriyayā karmaṇā yamabhipraiti sa saṁpradānaṁ bhavatīti |

2946:1534: tataśca gatikriyāyāḥ karmatvābhāvāttadviśeṣaṇasya kutaḥ karmatvamiti yuktamuktaṁ kriyāviśeṣaṇasya karmatvaṁ na syācchobhanaṁ grāmaṁ gacchatītyatra |

2946:1539: evaṁ hi śobhanaṁ grāmāya gacchatītyatrāpi karmatvena saṁpradānasya bādhanāccaturthī na syāt |
2946:1543: tathā grāmo gamyata iti karmaṇi lakārārthaṁ prārthanādikriyābhedābhāvācchobhanaṁ grāmaṁ gacchatītyatra śobhanamityasya karmatvāthaṁ bheda eva vyākhyeyo grāmamityasya tvabheda eveti bhāṣyakārābhiprayaḥ ||
2946:1550: tena pradhāyetyatra dadhāterhiḥ iti hyādeśo na bhavati |
2946:1552: jñāpakaṁ cātrādau jagdhirlyapti kiti ityatra lyabgrahaṇam |
2946:1553: anyathā hi prajagdhyetyatrāntaraṅgatvāt tkāvasthāyāṁ takārādau kitītyeva jagdhau siddhe lyapīti na kuryāt |

2946:1596: tena pratyayatvābhāve paradeśe niyamena prayogo na syādityapi draṣṭavyam |

2946:1749: etasyāḥ prāmāṇaṁ vā'sarūpo'striyām ityatra vāgrahaṇasya vyavasthitavibhāṣāvijñānaṁ nyāsakāreṇoktam |

2946:1792: lakṣaṇapratipadoktayoḥ pratidoktasyaiva grahaṇaṁ na tu lākṣaṇikasya ||

2946:1838: yathā saṁgrahaśabdasya vyutpattau nyāsakṛtoktaṁ samyak samantādveti |
2946:1841: khaṇḍaśo vyutpannaṁ hi lākṣaṇikamiti na sarvasaṁmatam |
