2946:2257: tena caṅi iti cakārānubandhe dvirvacanaṁ kriyamāṇaṁ tacchūnye'ṅi na bhavati |
2946:2260: so'nubandho yasya tasya grahaṇe sa yatra nāsti tasya grahaṇaṁ na bhavatītyaparo'syārtha ityāhuḥ |
2946:2261: tathā ca svādiṣvasarvanāmasthāne ityatrānayā prathamaikavacanagrahanamuktaṁ bhavati rakṣitena ||
2946:2270: udaśvitvānityatra hrasvanuḍbhyāṁ matup ityanena takāreṇa vyavadhānāddhrasvātparo matub na bhavatīti tasyodāttatvaṁ na bhavati |
2946:2280: jñāpakaṁ cātrānudāttādeḥ ityasyāño bādhanārthaṁ bilvādibhyo'ṇ iti vacanaṁ yadi vyañjanaṁ vidyamānaṁ syāttadā bilvādayo'nudāttādayo na bhaveyuḥ |
2946:2291: udāharaṇāntaraṁ cāsyāḥ paurvārddhikaṁ dākṣiṇārddhikamityatra ṭhañi ñnityādinniratyam ityanena |
2946:2299: diśaṣṭhañityucyamāne diśaḥ svarūpagrahaṇaṁ syāt pūrvapadagrahaṇe tu kṛte digityarthagrahaṇam |
2946:2302: yathā parāvarādhamottamapūrvācca ityatra parāvarādhamottamebhya iti karttavye pūrvagrahaṇaṁ parārddhyamityatra ṭhaño bhādhanārthamiti vṛttāvuktam |
2946:2304: padagrahaṇe sati pūrvagrahaṇādarthagrahaṇe vyavasthāpite bahupūrvārddhyamiti bahupūrvādarddhaśabdādapi ṭhañ syāt |
2946:2306: na hi pūrvagrahaṇenārthagrahaṇaṁ bahupūrvādibhyaḥ pratyayasya nirākaraṇaṁ cobhayaṁ śakyate karttum |
2946:2307: padagrahaṇe tu kṛte pūrvādiśabdebhya eva bhavati |
2946:2312: evaṁ ca sati dikpūrvapadāṭṭhañ ityatra yanmaitreyeṇoktam |
2946:2314: tathātrāsatyapi padagrahaṇe pūrvagrahaṇādeva svarūpagrahaṇannirastamiti tanna śobhanam ||
2946:2324: na napuṁsakatvamevāstu tata eva mṛdu pacatītyādi siddhyati |
2946:2326: kiṁ tva sati karmatve mṛdvādīnāṁ prathamāntatvāt sapūrvāyāḥ prathamāyā vibhāṣā ityanena grāme mṛdu te pacatītyādau vikalpena temayādividhayaḥ syuḥ |
2946:2327: dvitīyāntatve tu mṛdvādīnāṁ temayādividhayo nityā bhavanti |
2946:2328: atha kiṁ na bhavitavyameva grāme mṛdu te pacati grāme mṛdu tava pacatīti rūpadvayena,
2946:2330: sarva eva vānnāvādayo'nanvādeśe vibhāṣā vaktavyā iti vacanāt |
2946:2331: anvādeśe tvatho grāme mṛdu te pacatītyeva nityaṁ bhavati tadyadi mṛdvādīnāṁ prathamāntatvaṁ syāt tadā'nvādeśe'pi sapūrvāyāḥ prathamāyā vibhāṣā ityanena vikalpaḥ syāt |
2946:2336: tathāhi mṛdu pacatītyatra pākakriyāyāḥ prārthanādhyavasānādikriyayā vyāpyatvāt karmatvam |
2946:2338: kaścitphalamīpsuḥ phalaṁ paśyati etasyā etatphalamiti dṛṣṭvā prārthayate tatastāṁ karttumadhyavasyati |
2946:2339: gamyamanā ca kriyā kārakāṇāṁ nimittamiti gamyamānāyāḥ prārthanādikriyāyāḥ pākakriyā karma bhavati,
2946:2341: kriyāyāścāsattvabhūtatvāttadviśeṣaṇaṁ sāmānyena liṅgena napuṁsakenaiva nirddeṣṭuṁ yujyata iti |
2946:2342: nanu kriyānimittasya karmmatvamuktaṁ nimittaṁ ca siddhasvabhāvam |
2946:2343: kriyā ca sādhyasvabhāvā tatkathaṁ karmatvaṁ syāt |
2946:2356: tena naḍādibhyaḥ phak iti kevalādeva bhavati |
2946:2364: jñāpite ete paribhāṣe yenavidhiḥ iti sūtre bhāṣyakṛtā |
2946:2368: pūrvaśabdena prātipadike viśeṣite tadantavidhinā sapūrvādapi bhaviṣyati |
2946:2369: kevalācca vyapadeśivadbhāveneti nārtho'nena tat kṛtaṁ jñāpanārtham |
2946:2370: etacca jñāpayati ete paribhāṣe grahaṇavatetyādike sta iti |
2946:2371: ata eva pratyayavidhau jñāpitatvādgrahanavatetyādiparibhāṣādvayaṁ pratyayavidhiviṣayamākhyāya gostriyorupasarjanasya ityatra tadantavidhinā gośabdāntagrahaṇaṁ vyacakṣate |
2946:2372: anye ca sāmānyena pratyayavidhau cāpratyayavidhau ca paribhāṣāmāhuḥ |
2946:2373: tathā ca śeṣo ghyasakhi iti pratiṣedhaḥ kevala eva na tadante atisakherāgacchatīti |
2946:2376: ādyāyāstāvatsiddhaṁ viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvaṁ prati yatheṣṭatvādviśeṣaṇena hi tadantavidhirbhavati na viśeṣyeṇa |
2946:2377: tatra samāsavidhau dvitīyāśrita ityādau yatsupsupeti prakṛtaṁ na tacchritādibhirviśeṣyate,
2946:2378: api tu tenaiva śritādayo viśeṣyante śritādibhiḥ subantairiti,
2946:2379: tena tadantavidhyabhāvānna bhavati kaṣṭaṁ paramaśrita ityatra samāsaḥ |
2946:2380: pratyayavidhau naḍādibhyaḥ phak ityatra yatprātipadikāditi prakṛtaṁ tenaiva naḍāḍhyo viśeṣyante naḍādibhyaḥ prātipadikebhya iti teneha na bhavati sūtranaḍasyāpatyaṁ sautranāḍiriti |
2946:2381: yatra tu gṛhyamāṇena prakṛtaṁ viśeṣyate tatra bhavatyeva tadantavidhiḥ |
2946:2384: svagrahaṇānuvṛttyā vyapadeśivadbhāvācca kevale'pi bhavati bhayaṅkara ityāḍhyaṅkaraṇa iti ca |
2946:2385: kratṛvasthādisattrāntāṭṭhak ityatra tadantavidhinaiva tadantatve labdhe'ntagrahaṇaṁ kevalānmābhūdityevamartham |
2946:2388: kiṁ tvevaṁ gokulamityatra svaṁgrahaṇānuvṛttyā vyapadeśivadbhāvāccopasarjanahrasvatvaṁ prāpnoti tatra tadantagrahaṇasāmarthyādvyapadeśivadbhāvo na bhavatīti bhāgavṛttikṛtā gostriyorupasarjanasya ityatra samāhitam |
2946:2393: tena śritādīnāṁ subantaviśeṣaṇatve'pi tadantavidherabhāvākaṣṭaṁ paramaśrita ityatra samāso na bhavati |
2946:2409: jñāpakaṁ cātra ṇacaḥ striyāmañ ityatra striyāmiti vacanam |
2946:2411: karmavyatihāre ṇac striyām iti ṇacaḥ striyāmeva vidhānāt striyāmañapi siddha iti |
2946:2414: atra hi dvaudvau pādau dadāti dvedve śate dadātīti pādaśatasya saṁkhyādervīpsāyāṁ vun lopaśca iti vunpratyayo'ntyākāralopaśca |
2946:2418: evaṁ ca sthūlādibhyaḥ prakāre kan iti kangrahaṇaṁ karttavyaṁ na bhavati |
2946:2421: yadi kan vidhīyetāntyalope kṛte dviśatiketi na syāt |
2946:2422: tathā kani bhasaṁjñābhāvāddvipadiketi bhasaṁjñānibandhanaḥ pādaḥ pat iti padbhāvo na syāt |
2946:2426: kanvidhāne'pi siddhyati dviśatiketi sthūlādibhyaḥ prakāre kan ityekatkarttavyaṁ na bhavati |
2946:2427: dvipadiketi tu bhasaṁjñānimittapadādeśābhāvād rūpaṁ ca na siddhyatīti tadayuktam,
2946:2428: kanpratyaye'ntyalope ca kṛte dviśatiketyetadapi na siddhyati |
2946:2430: atha lopagrahaṇamapi na karttavyaṁ tarhi bhasaṁjñānimittapadādeśābhāvād rūpaṁ ca na siddhyatīti yaduktaṁ tadasaṅgataṁ syāt |
2946:2431: tathāhi yathā bhasaṁjñā nāsti tathā dakārāntaḥ pācchabdo'pi nāsti kathaṁ vā tadrūpañca na siddhyatītyucyate |
2946:2432: yāvatā'ntyalope kṛte padādeśe cābhyupagate satyantyo yo'kārastasyettve sati dvipadiketi siddhyatyeva |
2946:2436: rūpaṁ ca na siddhyatīti yaduktaṁ tadubhayatra veditavyam |
2946:2438: dviśatiketi na siddhyati dvipadiketi ca na siddhyati |
2946:2441: tathāhi vibhaktipāde adhunā ityatra sūtre rakṣitenoktam |
2946:2442: yadyayamadhunā pratyayaḥ syāttadā pūrvasūtra evādhunā pratyayaṁ vidadhyāt |
2946:2444: idama iś itīśādeśe kṛte yasyeti lope satyadhunetyasya siddhatvāt |
2946:2448: bhāṣye punaradhunāpratyaya evāyaṁ yasmādādisūtre kathitaḥ strī adhuneti pratyudāharaṇena,
2946:2449: tathā tu yogavibhāgo'narthakaḥ asminkāle vastunīti vivakṣāyāmikoci iti nummābhūditi ||
2946:2455: saṁprasāraṇaṁ saṁprasāraṇāśrayaṁ ca kāryaṁ balīyo bhavati ||
2946:2457: tena juhāvayiṣatītyatra hvaḥ saṁprasāranam iti śācchāsāhvāvyā iti yukaṁ badhitvā saṁprasāranam |
2946:2459: juhuvaturitya trākāralopaṁ bādhitvā saṁparmāranapūrvarūpatve eva bhavataḥ |
2946:2461: anyathā''to lopa iṭi ca ityākāralope sati tasyāsiddhavadatrābhāt ityasiddhatvāduvaṅna syāt |
2946:2462: kathaṁ tarhi brahmaśabda upapade jināterddhātorāto'nupasarge ka iti ke kṛte brahmajya iti syāt |
2946:2466: tathā ca brahmajiya ityaniṣṭaṁ rūpaṁ syāt |
2946:2468: sarvatra saṁprasāraṇibhyo ḍo vaktavya iti ḍapratyayena bhavitavyamiti |
2946:2470: atha vā kva cideṣā na sarvatreti |
2946:2473: tena brahmajyaḥ āhvaḥ prahva iti kapratyaye saṁprasāraṇapūrvarūpaṁ bādhitvā ikāralopastasyāsiddhatvādiyaṅuvaṅau na bhavataḥ |
2946:2474: tathā ceko yaṇaci iti kṛte siddhaṁ brahmajya ityādi |
2946:2475: jñāpakaṁ cāsyā bhāṣye liṭyabhyāsasyobhayeṣām ityatrobhayeṣāṁ vacanamuktam |
2946:2476: taddhi vavraścetyādau halādiḥ śeṣaḥ bādhitvā saṁprasāraṇaṁ yathā syādityevamarthaṁ kṛtaṁ tena kāryāntaraṁ bādhitvā saṁprasāraṇasya pravarttanādasyā astitvaṁ gamayati |
2946:2478: juhuvaturityādau pūrvavipratiṣedhena saṁprasāraṇasya saṁprasāraṇāśrayasya ca siddhiḥ |
2946:2479: kiṁ tu vyākhyānāt paribhāṣāśrayaṇameva laghviti nyāsakāreṇa punariyaṁ sahivahorodavarṇasya ityatrāvarṇagrahaṇena jñāpitā tasyaitat prayojanamūḍha ūḍhavānityatra saṁprasāraṇe pūrvarūpatve cokārasyautvaṁ mābhūditi |
2946:2481: dhatvaḍhatvaḍhalopesu saṁprasāraṇapūrvarūpatvābhyāṁ paratvādakārasyautve kṛte saṁprasāraṇapūrvarūpatvaṁ ca kariṣyāma iti na kiṁ cidaniṣṭamāpadyate |
2946:2484: yāvatā sthānedvirvacanapakṣe hūso dvirvacane kṛte juhūsādeśasya śabdāntaratvāt prakṛtipratyayavibhāgo nāsti |
2946:2492: tatrāyaṁ sādhāraṇaśca parihāraḥ sicprabhṛtīnāṁ ṣopadeśasya sāmarthyāt stautiṇyoreva iti stautigrahaṇāt sico yaṅi iti pratiṣedhāccaivaṁ jñāpyate śrutyabhedāttattvādhyavasāyena sthāne dvirvacane'pi kāryāṇi kriyante |
2946:2495: nanu kathaṁ sico yaṅi ityasya jñāpakatvamuktam |
2946:2496: yāvatopasargāt sunīti ityādinā ṣatve prāpte tanniṣedhārthaṁ tat syāt |
2946:2499: upasargāt sunoti iti yā prāptiḥ sā padādilakṣanameva ṣatvapratiṣedhamanantaratvād bādhate na sico yaṅi iti tasmādayaṁ pratiṣedhaḥ sarvatreti |
2946:2501: sātpadādyoḥ iti pratiṣedhe prāpta upasargādi sūtreṇa ṣatvaṁ vidhīyate |
2946:2509: na ca vācyaṁ sātpadādyoḥ ityādeśapratyayayoḥ ityasyāpavādaḥ |
2946:2514: sthānedvirvacanapakṣe parisesicyata ityatrāpi yakāravataḥ sicyabhāgasya dvirvacane sesicyādeśasya sijvyapadeśābhāvātkathamupasargādi sūtreṇa sijdvārikā mūrddhanyasya prāptiryanniṣedhārthaṁ sicoyaṅi iti syāt |
2946:2515: atha vā yadyatra sico'yaṅi iti kriyatām |
2946:2516: ayaṁ cārthaḥ yaṅpratyayaṁ varjayitvopasargāt sicaḥ ṣatvamiti tataḥ parisesicyata iti siddhe yatsico yaṅi iti kṛtaṁ tadādeśapratyayayoḥ ityasyāpi pratiṣedhārthamiti |
2946:2517: etasminpāde omāṅośca ityatra raksite pūrvapakṣo bahulapāde purastādapavādaparibhāṣāyāmuktaḥ ||
2946:2521: ekaḥ pūrvaparayoḥ ityataḥ pūrvagrahaṇānuvṛtyā'ntādivacca ityanenaikādeśaḥ pūrvasya kāryaṁ pratyantavat parasya kāryaṁ pratyādivatkriyate tatra yathā śakyeta vidhiḥ karttumiti pūrvasyāntavattvenāmū ityatrādaso'serdādu do ma iti bhavati tathā parasyādivattvenāgnī vṛkṣāvityatra pragṛhyatve bhavataḥ |
2946:2522: yatra tvekādeśa ubhayamāśrayati pūrvaṁ paraṁ ca tatrobhayata āśraye nāntavattvaṁ nāpyādivattvamiti vākyārthaḥ |
2946:2523: tena vṛkṣamityatraikādeśasya pūrvagrahaṇenāgrahaṇānnaṅgasyākārāntatvaṁ paragaraṇenāgrahaṇānmakārasya na suptvamiti dīrghatvābhāvaḥ |
2946:2524: tathā prohyata ityatropasargāḍvrasva ūhateḥh iti na bhavati |
2946:2526: ekādeśasya pūrvagrahaṇena grahaṇe kṛte ekadeśavikṛtadvāreṇa makāramātrasya suptvamāśritya dīrghatvena bhavitavyamiti |
2946:2528: iyaṁ ca paribhāṣāntādivacca ityatra bhāṣyakāreṇa paṭhitā |
2946:2530: yathobhayostulyabalayorekaḥ preṣyo bhavati avirodhārthī ubhayorapi kāryena pravarttata iti ||
2946:2534: tena khaṭvābhirmālābhirityatra pūrvaṁ pratyantavattvābhāvādato bhisa es ityaisna bhavati |
2946:2536: tathā hvayaterjuhāvetyatra saṁprasāraṇapūrvarūpasyānādivattvādāta au ṇala iti na bhavati |
2946:2537: tathā asyai aśvaḥ asyā aśva iti āṭaśca iti na vṛddhiḥ ||
2946:2538: iyaṁ ca paribhāṣāntādivacca ityatra bhāṣye paṭhitā |
2946:2539: jñāpakaṁ cāsyāḥ ṣatvatukorasiddha iti tugvidhāṣasiddhavacanaṁ kaiyaṭenoktam |
2946:2541: yadyeṣā na syāttadādhītyetyatra savarṇadīrghasya paragrahaṇena grahaṇe kṛte hrasvāśrayastuk siddhastukyasiddhavacanamanarthakaṁ syāt |
2946:2542: nanvasyāṁ satyāṁ kṣīrapeṇetyatra pūrvaṁ pratyanantavattvenaikājuttarapadeṇa iti ṇatvaṁ na prāpnotyekājāśrayeṇa varṇāśrayatvāttatra pratiṣedha eva yuktaḥ |
2946:2544: yāveva pūrvaparau varṇāvāśrityaikādeśaḥ pravarttate tadvarṇāśraye'ntādivadbhāvo neṣyate |
2946:2546: iha tvekādeśa eva kṛte yo varṇa ekājuttara ākāraśca tadāśrayau ṇatveyaṅvidhī na tau nivartyete |
2946:2549: tadevaṁ khaṭvābhirityādau pūrvaṁ pratyantavattve'pi tadekadeśatā labhyate na tu tadrūpateti tatkuta aisprasaṅga iti |
2946:2557: yatra saṁjñayā svarūpeṇa vā kṛto grahanaṁ bhavati |
2946:2558: tatra gatikārakapūrvamapi gṛhyate na tu yataḥ pratyayastadādyeva |
2946:2559: tadyathā kṣepa iti ktāntena samāsaḥ sagatinā sakārakeṇa ca bhavati |
2946:2564: tena ktānta uttarapade pūrvasyānantarasya gatisvaro vidhīyate |
2946:2566: tatra yadīyaṁ paribhāṣā na bhavet tadā pratyayagrahaṇaparibhāṣyaivoddhūtaśabde saṁghāte saktānte prāptireva nāstīti kimetannivṛttyarthenānantaragrahaṇena tatkṛtaṁ jñāpayatyastīyaṁ paribhāṣeti |
2946:2569: anyathā kārakapūrvagrahaṇasya grahaṇe kiṁ jñāpakaṁ syāt |
2946:2570: anayā paribhāṣayā kṛttaddhitasamāsāśca ityatrāpi kṛdgrahaṇe gatikārakapūrvasyāpi grahaṇaṁ prāpnoti tatra yat samādhānaṁ ca tadgatikārakopapadānāṁ kṛdbhiḥ samāsavacanamityasyāṁ paribhāṣāyāmuktam |
2946:2572: tena prajñāsukaraḥ kaṭa ityatra khityanavyayasya iti hrasvo'rurdviṣadajantasya iti ca mumna bhavati kūlamudraja itivat ||
2946:2576: tena bhuvāraṇyāśaṁsādhṛtadhanuṣayāhūya tṛṇavaḍhityatra dhanuṣaśca ityanaṅna bhavati |
2946:2577: tathā bahvāmpi taḍāgānītyatra ṛkpūrabdhūḥ ityakāro na bhavati ||
2946:2580: yadi ca nityaḥ samāsāntaḥ syāttadopasargādadhvana iti samāsānte'ci kṛte cittvādevāntodāttatvaṁ siddhamiti tatrādhvagrahaṇaṁ na kuryāt |
2946:2582: tathā bhāṣye dvitribhyāṁ pāddanmūrddhasu bahuvrīhau ityatra sūtre'kritasamāsāntasya mūrddhaśabdasyopādānaṁ liṅgam |
2946:2583: nitye hi samāsānte yathā pāditi daditi ca pādasya lopo'hastyādibhya iti vayasi dantasya datṛ iti kṛtasamāsantau nirddiṣṭau tathā mūrddhaśabdo'pi dvitribhyāṁ ṣa mūrddhna iti kṛtasamāsānto nirddiṣṭaḥ syāt |
2946:2584: tataśca mūrddheṣviti nirddeśaḥ syāttasmāttathā cākṛtasamāsāntanirddeśaḥ samāsāntavidheranityatvaṁ jñāpayati |
2946:2588: yasmātpratyayavidhi sūtre bhāgavṛttikṛtā samāsānto vidhiranitya iti naiṣā paribhāṣā bhāṣye jñāpakābhāvāditi tadayuktam |
2946:2589: nanu lāghavārthaṁ samāsāntanirdeśo na kṛto'nyathā mūrddheṣviti gauravaṁ syāt |
2946:2591: evaṁ ca samāsāntakramo na laṅghito bhavatīti jñāpitam ||
2946:2599: tadyathā grāmaṇi brāhmaṇakulamityatra hrasvatve kṛte tugna bhavati |
2946:2602: vṛttau paddhatāvityatra tarhyacca gheḥ ityadādeśe kṛte ṭab mābhūditi prayojanam |
2946:2606: śatāni sahasrāṇīti vibhaktisaṁnipātena numi kṛte tasya vibhaktilukaṁ pratyanimittatvāt ṣṇāntā ṣaṭ iti ṣaṭsaṁjñā na bhavati |
2946:2608: tathā kumbhakārebhya ityatraitve kṛte kṛnmejanta iti na bhavati ||
2946:2609: iyaṁ ca paribhāṣā kṛnmejanta ityatra bhāṣyakāreṇa paṭhitā |
2946:2611: taddhi satyāmasyāṁ vibhaktinimittayostricaturoḥ striyāṁ tisṛcatasṛ iti ṛkārāntaorvyavadhānakāriṇaṁ ṅīpaṁ pratyanimittatvāddīrghaprāptau pratiṣedhavacanamupapadyate |
2946:2612: anyathā tu ṅīpā vyavahitatvānnāmi dīrghatvāprāpteḥ pratiṣedhavacanamanarthakaṁ syāt |
2946:2614: anityā ceyaṁ kaṣṭāya kramaṇa iti nirddeśe'kārāntanimitte ṅerya iti ye kṛte yādau supi ca iti dīrghakaraṇādāhuḥ tena |
2946:2617: nanu kathaṁ kaṣṭāya iti jñāpakaṁ yāvatā'to dīrgho yañīti yakāreṇa pratyāhārasāmarthyāt |
2946:2618: kaṣṭāya ityatra supi ca ipi dīrghatvaṁ siddhyati |
2946:2620: pvādīnāṁ hrasva ityatrāgaṇāntāḥ pvādaya iti darśane jānātītyatra jñājanorjā iti jādeśe kṛte hrasvatvaṁ prāpnoti tanmābhūdityevamarthaṁ dīrghāntādeśavidhānamuktam |
2946:2621: anyathā yadi jānātītyatrapvādīnāṁ hrasva iti hrasvatvena bhavitavyam |
2946:2623: nanu jayata ityatra dīrghaśrutyarthaṁ dīrghāntajādeśavidhānaṁ syāt |
2946:2625: jabhāve'pi kṛte'to dīrgho yañi iti dīrghatvamiti na śakyate vaktum |
2946:2626: yadi punarāgaṇāntāḥ pvādayo na bhavantīti darśanam |
2946:2628: aṅgavṛttaparibhāṣayā vā hrasvābhāvo'bhidhīyate kṛte vā hrasvatve tu punarato dīrgho yaṅi iti dīrghatvam |
2946:2629: tadā yakāreṇa pratyāhāragrahaṇasāmarthyād dīrghatvaṁ śakyata eva vaktumiti nānityatve jñāpakam |
2946:2632: yadīyaṁ nityā syāt tadā vṛtrahabhyāmityatrānayaiva tag na bhaviṣyatīti tuggrahanamanarthakam ||
2946:2636: tenāllopo'na iti yathā sārthakasya bhavati rājño rājñeti |
2946:2644: mana iti ṅīppratiṣedho yathā sudāmetyatra bhavati tathā suprathimetyatrāpi |
2946:2649: yadi tvarthavarparibhāṣā nityā syāttardārthavatparibhāṣayaivārvādeśasya tṛśabdasya nirāse siddhe tṛntṛcormedenopādānamanarthakam |
2946:2654: yato nityatvānnumi kṛte upadhāyā vihitatvāddīrthatvaṁ na bhaviṣyati |
2946:2656: vā ṣapūrvasya nigama ityataḥ pūrvagrahaṇānuvṛtternumaḥ prāg dīrghatvameva bhaviṣyatīti manyate |
2946:2658: anyathā bahvāmpi taḍāgānītyatrāpi numi kṛte dīrghatvaṁ na syāt ||
2946:2659: anyastvāha tṛntṛcorbhedenopādānaṁ sāmānye'pi nirddeśe kvacidviśeṣo gṛhyata iti jñāpanārtham |
2946:2660: tena na kopadhāyā ityatra sāmānyoktāvapi taddhitavusambadhyeva kakāro ghyate na kakāramātram |
2946:2661: tena kopadhapratiṣedhe taddhitavugrahaṇaṁ karttavyamityetadvaktavyaṁ na bhavati |
2946:2662: etanmate paribhāṣāyā anityatve āniloṭ ityatra loḍgrahaṇaṁ jñāpakam |
2946:2663: tathāhi pravayāni māṁsānītyatrānarthakalvādeva ṇatvābhāvaḥ siddha iti ||
2946:2668: tena bhavatītyatra yaṇādeśaṁ bādhitvā guṇa eva bhavati ||
2946:2671: tena siverauṇādike na pratyaye syona ityatra siuna iti sthite'ntaraṅgatvāllaghūpadhaguṇaṁ bādhitvā yaṇeva bhavati |
2946:2672: atra cārthe cchoḥ śūḍanunāsike ca ityatra satukkasya chakārasyopādānaṁ liṅgam |
2946:2673: yadi vyāśraye'pi pravarttate tadā chakāranimittaṁ varṇatukaṁ bādhitvā viśna ityādāvanunāsikanimitta āṅgaśchakārasya śakāraḥ syāttatra kṛte nimittābhāvānnāsti tugiti kiṁ satukkachakāropādāneneti |
2946:2677: yadāha cyavante plavante ityatra vārṇādāṅgaṁ balīya ityekādeśāt prāgguṇa iti |
2946:2678: tatrāsyāḥ kva cidvyāśraye'pi pravṛttirityatrārthe yajayācayatavicchapraccharakṣo naṅ ityatra naṅo ṅitkaraṇaṁ guṇapratiṣedhārthaṁ kriyamāṇaṁ jñāpakam |
2946:2679: anyathā hi vicchestuki sati guṇaprasaṅga eva nāstīti naṅo ṅitkaraṇamanarthakaṁsyāt ||
2946:2683: yadi ca vārṇādāṅgasya balīyastvaṁ na syāt |
2946:2684: tadā'ntaraṅgatvātkṛte savarṇadīrghatve iyaṅuvaṅoḥ prāptireva nāstīti kimasavarṇeneti tatkṛtaṁ jñāpayatyastīyaṁ paribhāṣeti |
2946:2686: yadi savarṇe'cīyaṅuvaṅau na bhavatastadeyeṣovoṣetyatrāpīyaṅuvaṅau na prāpnutaḥ,
2946:2687: yato'trāpyacaḥ parasminpūrvavidhau iti sthānivadbhāvādiyaṅuvaṅośca karttavyayoḥ savarṇasya parasyāco vidyamānatvamiti |
2946:2692: paratvādguṇe kṛte dvirvacane'ci iti sthānivadbhāvād dvirvacanam |
2946:2693: dvirvacane kṛte sthānivadbhāvavidhau dvirvacana evetyavadhāraṇādguṇaḥ pūrvarūpeṇā'vatiṣṭhate |
2946:2695: tenācaḥ parasmin itīyaṅuvaṅoḥ karttavyayoḥ sthānivadbhāvo na bhavati |
2946:2696: yadi hi syāttadārtterevābhyāsāsyeyaṅādeśo vidheya ityartterabhyāsastyetyeva brūyāt |
2946:2697: idamevāsavarṇagrahaṇaṁ yohyanādiṣṭādacaḥ pūrvastasya vidhiṁ prati sthānivadityasyāḥ paribhāṣāyā mūlam ||
2946:2699: yo hyanādiṣṭādacaḥ purvastasya vidhiṁ prati sthānivat ||
2946:2701: yo hyacaḥ parasmin iti sthānivadbhāvaḥ so'nādiṣṭādacaḥ pūrvasya kārye bhavati |
2946:2702: tena paṭayatītyatra ṭāśabdākārādanādiṣṭādacaḥ pūrvo yaḥ paśabdākārastasyā'ta upadhāyā iti vṛddhiṁ prati lopaḥ sthānivadbhavati |
2946:2703: ādiṣṭādacaḥ pūrvasya kārye tu na sthānivattvaṁ yathā vaiyākaraṇaḥ sauvaśva iti |
2946:2705: atra hyacaḥ pūrvayorecoḥ sambhavo nāsti yakāravakārābhyāṁ pūrvayoraicorvidhānāt |
2946:2709: yadi hyādiṣṭādacaḥ pūrvasya kārye sthānivattvaṁ na syāttarhīḍarthanipātanaṁ vṛttikṛtoktamayuktaṁ syāt |
2946:2710: tathāhīṇ dvirvacane kṛte dīrgha iṇaḥ kiti iti dīrghatve kṛte tataḥ savarṇadīrghatvenaikāctvādeva vasvekājādghamām itīḍāgamaḥ siddhaḥ syādupeyivānityatra |
2946:2711: na ca vācyaṁ dīrgha īṇaḥ kiti iti dīrghavidhānasāmarthyātsavarṇadīrghatvena na bhavitavyam |
2946:2715: yata evādiṣṭādacaḥ pūrvasya kva citkārye sthānivattvaṁ pravarttate'ta eva savarṇavidhiṁ prati na sthānivaditi pratiṣedha upapadyate |
2946:2717: tathā yadvakṣyatyupadhāyāṁ ca ityatra dīrghavidhau riryatū riryurityatra sthānivattvapravṛttyā yaṇādeśaṁ kṛtvā dvirvacane kṛte'caḥ parasmin iti sthānivadbhāvānna dīrgha iti tadupapadyate ||
2946:2721: ajādeśaḥ paranimittakaḥ pūrvasya vidhau sthānivat kutaḥ pūrvasya vidhau sthānivattvamacaḥ |
2946:2727: yadi cādiṣṭādapyacaḥ pūrvatra kārye sthānivattvaṁ syāttadā'ttvamapi naiva kuryāt ||
2946:2731: tena vido laṭo vā iti ṇalādyādeśavikalpo yaṅlugantasyāpi bhavati |
2946:2738: nyāyasiddhatvamasyā niṣṭhā śīṅādi sūtre nyāsakṛtā darśitam |
2946:2741: dviḥ prayoge ca sa eva dvirāvarttyata iti yuktaṁ prakṛtigrahaṇe yaṅlugantasyāpi grahaṇamiti |
2946:2744: ūdorgoha iti lāghavārthaṁ vaktavye yadupadhāgrahaṇaṁ karoti tadyaṅluki jogṛhatītyatra yo'bhāsasyaukārastasya mābhūdityevamarthaṁ kriyate |
2946:2750: jñāpakavādino mate tatrāta iti nīstha prtipādayitavyaḥ |
2946:2754: yaccaikājgrahaṇaṁ tatra pañcaitāni na yaṅluki” śtipā nirddeśa indhibhavatibhyāṁ ca iti |
2946:2762: yatra tu dhātvavayavasya nirddeśo yathaikāco dve prathamasya ityatraikājgrahaṇaṁ yaṅluṅnivṛttyarthaṁ na bhavati |
2946:2763: tena yaṅluki dvirvacanena bobhavatīti siddhyatīti yathākathañcidāhuḥ |
2946:2764: nanu bhavatītyatrākartṛvācini sārvadhātuke śtipi kathaṁ śabutpadyate |
2946:2773: evaṁ tarhi indhibhavatibhyāṁ ca iti nirdeśādeva śap |
2946:2774: kathaṁ tarhīkśtipau dhātunirddeśe vaktavyāviti vyācakṣāṇena nyāsakṛtoktaṁ śitkaraṇasāmarthyācchabiti |
2946:2776: śitaḥ karaṇaṁ yasyeti bahuvrīhiṇā śitkaraṇaśabdena bhavatinirddeśa evocyate |
2946:2788: grāmaṇi brāhmaṇakulamityatra hrasvasya piti kṛti iti na tuk |
2946:2789: nārkuṭo nārpatyamityatra kharavasānayoḥ iti na bhavati |
2946:2791: jñāpakaṁ cātra vāha ūṭh ityūṭho vidhānam |
2946:2793: prakṛtaṁ samprasāraṇameva vakārasya vidhīyatāṁ tataḥ pūrvarūpatvam |
2946:2794: tato ṇvipratyayasya pratyayalakṣaṇenokārasyaukāro guṇastato vṛddhirecīti vṛddhyā siddhaṁ praṣṭhauheti |
2946:2796: tatkimūṭho vidhānena tat kṛtaṁ jñāpayatyastīyaṁ paribhāṣeti |
2946:2797: bahiraṅgaṁ samprasāraṇaṁ bhasañjñānimittapratyaye vidhānāttatrāntaraṅge'bhyantaraṅge pratyayāśraye guṇe karttavye bahiraṅgasya samprasāraṇasyāsiddhatvādukāro nāstīti kathaṁ guṇaḥ syāditi ||
2946:2799: taccānityatvaṁ nalopaḥ supsvara iti tugvidhau nalopasyāsiddhatvena jñāpitam |
2946:2802: tadā'nayaiva vṛtrahabhyāmityatrāntaraṅge tuki karttavye bahiraṅgasya nalopasyāsiddhatvaṁ siddhamevetyanityatve jñāpakam |
2946:2805: tena vṛtrahacchatramityatra tuki karttavye'siddhaṁ bahiraṅgamantaraṅga iti na pravarttate |
2946:2809: vṛtrahacchatramityatra nalopo na bahiraṅgo'pi tu tugeva tuko dvipadāśrayatvāt |
2946:2810: vṛtrahabhyāmityatra tu vibhaktimāśritya nalopa iti tatra tasya bahiraṅgatvam |
2946:2811: anityatve cāmū ityatraikādeśasya bahiraṅgasyāntaraṅge utve matve ca karttavye'siddhatvanna bhavati |
2946:2812: tathā papuṣaḥ paśyetyatra samprasāraṇasyāsiddhatvādvalakṣaṇo vasvekājādbhasām itīṇ na bhavati |
2946:2823: atrāpyacorānantarye bahiraṅgasyādguṇasya pravṛttatvād siddhaṁ bahiraṅgamantaraṅga ityasyāḥ pratiṣedho yuktaḥ |
2946:2825: acorānantarye sati yatrobhayamantaraṅgaṁ bahiraṅgañca tatreyaṁ pratiṣidhyate yathā bahavo'kṣadyūriti |
2946:2826: tathāhyatra bahiraṅge pravṛtte vidyamāna eva guṇa ūṭhi vāntaraṅgāvayaṇādeśau karttavyatayā vidyete |
2946:2827: pacāvedamityatra bahiraṅga ekādeśe kṛte'corānantaryaṁ nivṛttamityacorānantarye dvayaṁ na vidyate |
2946:2829: yadyevamadhītya pretyetyatrāpyekādeśe kṛte'corānantarye dvayannāsti kathaṁ tadā ṣatvatukorasiddha ityasya jñāpakatopapattiḥ |
2946:2830: tathāhyatra pūrvaṁ dhāturupasargeṇa yujyata ityatra darśane dīrghāduttarakālamantaraṅge tuki karttavye'corānantaryannasti |
2946:2831: evaṁ tarhi pūrvaṁ dhātuḥ sādhanena yujyata ityasmin darśane'dhītya pretyetyatra nājānantarya ityucyate |
2946:2832: etaddarśane hyekādeśāt prāg lyapi kṛte'corānantarye'ntaraṅga bahiraṅgaṁ ca iyaṁ vidyata eva |
2946:2833: na cāsmin darśane'ntaraṅgatvāttuki kṛte ṣatvatukorasiddha ityasyānarthakyam |
2946:2836: atha vā pūrvaṁ dhāturupasargeṇa yujyate ityatrāpyakṛtavyūhā iti pravibhajyānvākhyāne'corānantaryamasti |
2946:2837: kiṁ ca ṣatvatukīrasiddha ityatra dhātostannimittasyaiva ityatra nyāsakṛtā vyākhyātam |
2946:2838: saṁhitādhikārīye kārye karttavye'siddhaṁ bahiraṅgamantaraṅga iti nājānantarya ityanayā bādhyate |
2946:2839: eta ai itīdaṁ prakaraṇāntaravihitaṁ kāryamiti kutastatra karttavye pratiṣedhe ucyate |
2946:2840: etadeva cchvoḥ śūḍanunāsike ca ityatra maitreyeṇoktam |
2946:2841: acorānantarye yattad dvayaṁ prāpnotyantaraṅgaṁ bahiraṅgaṁ ca tatreyaṁ pratiṣidhyate,
2946:2842: iha tu kṛta eva bahiraṅge'corānantarye ca nivṛtte'ntaraṅgaṁ prāpnotīti kutastasyāḥ pratiṣedha ityādinā granthena |
2946:2846: acorānantarye yatra dvayamasti bahiraṅgaṁ pravṛttamantaraṅgaṁ prāpnotyantaraṅgaṁ pravṛttaṁ bahiraṅgaṁ vā tatra bahiraṅgaparibhāṣā pratiṣidhyata iti ||
2946:2848: yadyacorānantarye'pi bahiraṅgasyāsiddhatvaṁ syāttadādhītyetyādāvantaraṅge tuki karttavye padadvayāśritasya savarṇadīrghasyāsiddhaṁ bahiraṅgamantaraṅga ityata evāsiddhatvādasiddhavacanamanarthakaṁ syāt,
2946:2853: tena dhāma svāyambhuvaṁ yayurityatraurguṇa ityasyābhāvāduvaṅ siddhyati |
2946:2857: jñāpakaṁ cātra oroditi karttavye orguṇa iti guṇagrahaṇam,
2946:2858: tathoto vṛddhirluki hali ityatra auditi karttavye vṛddhigrahaṇam |
2946:2860: evaṁ ca kṅiti ca ityatrācinavamasunavamitisiddhyarthaṁ vṛttau yaduktaṁ yāsuṭo ṅidvacanaṁ jñāpakaṁ lakārāśrayaṁ ṅittvamādeśānāṁ na bhavatīti tadupapadyate |
2946:2862: nanu tathāpyasya jñāpakatvamayuktaṁ vinuyurityādau jusi ca iti pratiṣedhārthatvāt |
2946:2864: yataḥ satyapi ṅittve bhavitavyamevātra jusi ca iti guṇena,
2946:2867: yena nāprāptinyāyena sārvadhātukamapit ityanena yan ṅittvaṁ tadevānena bādhyate |
2946:2871: skasyāci ityato'cītyanuvarttyājādau jusi guṇo vidheya iti |
2946:2873: apiḥ padārthasambhāvanā ityatra stuyādityatra ṅicca pinna bhavatīti vacanādrakṣitena vṛddhyabho vyākhyātaḥ |
2946:2877: yāvatā picca ṅinna bhavatyanena ṅittvābhāvādguṇaḥ siddha eva |
2946:2880: ata eva serhyapicca ityatra nyāsa uktam |
2946:2882: anyathā tatrāpi ṅicca pinna bhavatīti kaḥ prasaṅgaḥ pittvasya syāditi |
2946:2883: nanu yadi sūtrakārasyānapekṣitamidaṁ ṅicca pinna bhavatīti tathā brūtādbhavānityatra pittvasya sthānivadbhāvād bruva īṭ itīṭ syāt |
2946:2885: satyapi sambhave bādhanaṁ bhavatīti tātaṅo ṅittvena tipaḥ pittvaṁ bādhanīyam |
2946:2886: evaṁ bhindyādityatrāpi tipaḥ pittvena liṅo ṅittvasya bādhitatvāt ||
2946:2891: dhīvarītyādau ṅīpsanniyogaśiṣṭo vano ra ca iti rephādeśaḥ pañcadhīvetyādau pañcabhirddhīvarībhiḥ krītetyārhīyasya ṭhako'dhyarddhadvigorlugasaṁjñāyām iti luki kṛte luktaddhitaluki iti ṅīpo nivṛttau rephasyāpi nivṛttiḥ ||
2946:2892: ayāḥ paribhāṣāyāśchedādibhyo nityam ityatra bhāṣyakāreṇa nyāyasiddhatvamuktam |
2946:2895: tadyathā devadattayajñadattābhyāmidaṁ karttavyamityukte devadattāpāye yajñadatto'pi na karotīti |
2946:2897: tatra hyuktaṁ vilvakādibhya iti kukā nirddeśaḥ,
2946:2898: kuk cā'yaṁ naḍādīnāṁ kukca iti chapratyayasaṁniyuktastaśca bilvādibhyaḥ paraścha eva sambhavatīti bilvakādibhyo lugityucyamāne bhasañjñānimittapratyaye chasyaiva lugbhaviṣyati kiṁ chagrahaṇena tatkṛtaṁ chasyaiva kevalasya lugyathā syāt |
2946:2902: nanu yadi bilvakādibhyo lugityucyate sāmānyena pratyayamātrasya luksyāt |
2946:2903: tathā ca bilvakādityatra supo'pi luk syāt |
2946:2906: nanvevamapi bilvakasyāvayavo vikāro vā bailvaka ityatra kopadhācca ityasyāṇo luk prāpnoti |
2946:2907: evaṁ tarhyāpatyasya ca taddhite'nāti ityatastaddhita ityanuvṛttestaddhitasya bhasaṁjñasya taddhite parato luk |
2946:2908: evamapi bilvake bhavī bailvako vailvakasyedaṁ bailvakīyamityatra prāpnoti |
2946:2911: na cātra bilvakāccho vihito'pi tu bailvakāditi ||
2946:2913: taccānityatvaṁ bhyasyāḍhe taddhita ityaḍha iti puṁvadbhāvapratiṣedhena jñāpitam |
2946:2914: tatra hyaḍha iti kimityutkvā śyaineyo rauhiṇeya iti prtyudāhṛtam |
2946:2916: tadā yasyeti ca iti lope kṛte sanniyogaparibhāṣayā nakārasyā'pi nivṛttiḥ syāt |
2946:2918: nanu kathamanarthako yāvatā lope satyacaḥ parasmin iti sthānivadbhāvena pratyayalakṣaṇenāsiddha paribhāṣayā vā ṅīsanniyogo vidyata eva |
2946:2919: evaṁ ca sati sanniyogaparibhāṣāyā anupasthānānnakārādeśo na nivarttate |
2946:2922: na tu luptavarṇasannidhānaṁ na caivaṁ sanniyogaparibhāṣāyā anupasthānam |
2946:2925: anyathā chasya lukyapi kṛte kuko nivṛttirna prāpnoti pratyayalakṣaṇādinā tasya vidyamānatvāt ||
2946:2930: taṇapratyaye'pi bhavati tena cūrā śīlamasyā iti chatrāditvāṇapratyayāntādapi ṅībhavati |
2946:2938: tatra karmaśabdāttacchīlamityanuvarttamāne chatrāditvāṇapratyaye kārma iti nipātyate |
2946:2940: tastaddhita iti ṭilopena kārma iti siddhe ṭilopārthaṁ nipātanamayuktam |
2946:2945: yadi tācchīlike'pyaṇkṛtaṁ kāryaṁ bhavatīti kimarthaṁ tarhi tācchīlike'ṣvaṇpratyaya eva na vidhīyate |
2946:2946: evaṁ ca jñāpakaṁ karttavyaṁ na bhavati |
2946:2953: tena sṛjidṛśorjhalyamakiti ityam rajjusṛgbhyāmityatra kvibantānāṁ satyapi dhātutve supi prātipadikapratyaye na bhavati |
2946:2954: tathā'ci vibhāṣā iti girau gira ityatra na bhavati |
2946:2957: tathā naśervā iti naśadhātvāśritaṁ kutvamapi pakṣe na syāt |
2946:2959: padasya kutvavidhānānna dhātupratyayāśritaṁ kutvaṁ numāgamastu dhātupratyayāśrita eva |
2946:2961: śriyau śriyo bhruvau bhruva ityādau prātipadikapratyayepīyaṅuvaṅau bhavataḥ |
2946:2962: oḥ supi iti varṣābhvaśca iti sūtrārambhāt |
2946:2963: parivyavebhyaḥ kriyaḥ bhuvaḥ prabhava iti nirddeśācca |
2946:2966: atra hi pāṭhe dṛgbhyāṁ dṛgbhirityatrānudāttasya cardupadhasyānyatarasyām ityatrāsvarūpadhātugrahaṇāt supyapyamāgamaḥ syāt |
2946:2967: etaccāpi vibhāṣā ityatra mjervṛddhiḥ ityatra ca rakṣitena vyākhyātam |
2946:2968: etasyāḥ paribhāṣāyā dāṇḍināyanādi sūtre bhrauṇahatyaśabde tatvanipātanaṁ liṅgam |
2946:2969: tathāhi yadyeṣā na syāt tadā hanasto'ciṇaloḥ iti ṣyañi tatvaṁ siddhamiti nipātanamanarthakaṁ syāt |
2946:2973: na kvādeḥ iti yogavibhāgena kutvaṁ bhaviṣyati |
2946:2975: paratvāṭṭilopaṁ bādhitvā hanasto'ciṇaloḥ iti tasya vidyamānatvāt |
2946:2988: yo yasya madhyapātī sa tadgrahaṇena gṛhyata ityarthaḥ |
2946:2989: tena sarvaka ityatra sākackasyāpi sarvanāmatve jasaḥ śī iti śībhāvaḥ |
2946:2990: tathā vaiyākaraṇa ityatrāpyaijāgame kṛte taddhitadvārikā prātipaḍhikasaṁjñā ||
2946:2993: tatrābhaṭṭā api bhadṛvyapadeśaṁ samāsadayanti tathā'mallā api mallavyapadeśam |
2946:2995: yadyeṣā na syāttademadasoḥ pratiṣedha ucyamāno'kaci kṛte imakairamukairityatra śabdāntaratvādeva na syāt |
2946:2998: yadyevaṁ kathaṁ tarhi sa eva bhagavānnedamadasorakoḥ ityatredamadasoḥ kāditi niyamaṁ kṛtvā niṣedhaṁ pratyākhyātavān |
2946:3002: etattadoḥ sulopo'koranañsamāse hali ityatra yadakoriti padaṁ tadbhaviṣyati |
2946:3005: paśyāmācaṣṭe paśyayatītyatra prastāve yad dūṣaṇādikaṁ tan ṅyāppāde'kṛtavyūhā ityatroktam ||
2946:3009: tena purāṇaprokteṣu iti nipātanasya nityamabādhakatvāt sāyaṁciraṁprāhṇepragevyayebhyaṣṭyuṭyulau tuṭ ca iti ṭyuṭyulau tuḍāgamo'pibhavati |
2946:3012: jñāpakaṁ cātra trayāṇāmiti siddhaye trestraya iti sūtram |
2946:3013: yadi hi bādhakānyeva nipātanāni syustadā nijāntrayāṇām iti siddhaṁ syāt |
2946:3014: yadā tvabādhakānyapi nipātanāni bhavanti tadā trīṇāmiti prayoganivṛttyarthaṁ trestraya iti sūtramarthavadbhavati |
2946:3018: ata eva tatraiva sūtre bhāgavṛttiḥ purātanamunermunitāmiti |
2946:3019: purātanīrnnadīriti ca pramādapāṭhāvetau gatānugatikatayā kavayaḥ prayuñjate na teṣāṁ lakṣaṇaṁ cakṣuriti ||
2946:3023: tenāsthidadhītyādiā priyāsthnā priyadadhnetya trāpyanaṅ bhavati grahaṇavatā prātipadikenetyasyāyamapavādaḥ ||
2946:3025: taddhyaśvayugityatra nummābhūdityevamarthaṁ kriyate yadi cāṅgādhikāre taduttarapadasyāpi kāryaṁ na bhavati tadā yujernnumyaśvayuji kaḥ prasaṅgo yanniṣedhārthamasamāsagrahaṇaṁ syāditi ||
2946:3032: laukika evāyaṁ nyāya ubhe abhyastam ityatra bhāṣyakāreṇa vyākhyātaḥ |
2946:3038: yadi hi pratyekaṁ vākyasambandho na syāttadottamagrahaṇamiḍvasmasāṁ trikeṇa sambaddhamiti ṇalaḥ kevalasya viśeṣaṇaṁ na syāt ||
2946:3043: etadarthaṁ saṁyoga iti mahatī saṁjñā kṛteti nyāsakṛtoktam |
2946:3044: laukika evāyaṁ nyāyo vṛddhirādaijityatra bhāṣye darśitaḥ |
2946:3045: gargāḥ śataṁ daṇḍyantāmiti samudāyenārthino rājānohiraṇyena bhavantīti |
2946:3049: śatamatra pradhānaṁ karma gargāstu guṇakarma tadaṅgatvāt |
2946:3052: prathayoḥ pūrvasavarṇa ityatra prathamādvitīyayorvvacanaṣaṭkayoḥ prayuktaṁ prathamayoriti padam |
2946:3053: prathamāśabdo hi yadi supāṁ trikasya svaujasiti samudāyasya sañjñā syāt |
2946:3054: sāmīpyāccāmauṭśasiti trikeṣu prayujyate tadā prathamayoriti nirddeśaḥ sādhīyān bhavati |
2946:3055: yadi tu pratyekaṁ prathamāśabdaḥ syāttadā sorekavacanasya prathamāśabdena grahaṇaṁ syāt sāmīpyāccāma iti lāghavārthaṁ svamorityevaṁ kuryāt |
2946:3056: tasmātprathamayoḥ iti nirddeśena samudāyena vākye parisamāptiṁ bodhayati |
2946:3059: yathā gargaiḥ saha na bhoktavyamiti pratyekaṁ na bhujyate samuditaiśceti |
2946:3060: tena svādividhivākyasya bahuṣu bahuvacanam ityādinā karmaṇi dvitīyā ityādinā ca śāstreṇaikavākyatāpattau tatra tatrābhidhīyamānāvupayujyate iti ||
2946:3067: abhedakatvaṁ ca yathā devadatto gauro lohitaḥ kṛṣṇo vā vṛddho veti svāmabhikhyāṁ na jahāti evaṁ ca śāstra ubhayagrahaṇe prāpte niyamo'yam ||
2946:3071: yadi bhedakāḥ syurguṇāstadodāttaguṇayukta evākāra uccārayitavya ityudāttagrahaṇamanarthakaṁ syāt |
2946:3078: upadeśe bhava aupadeśikaḥ prayoge bhavaḥ prāyogikaḥ adhyātmāditvāṭṭhañ |
2946:3080: tadyathā taraptamapaugha iti pratyayasyaiva tarapo ghasañjñā |
2946:3082: na tu taratareppratyaye kṛte yaḥ prayogastasya nadītara iti |
2946:3083: yadi tu syād gharūpa iti hrasvaḥ syāt ||
2946:3084: jñāpakaṁ cātra śvīdito niṣṭhāyām iti śvigrahaṇam |
2946:3085: yadi prāyogikasyāpi grahaṇamabhaviṣyat tadā samprasāraṇe kṛte śūnaḥ śūnavānityatrogantatvādeva śyukaḥ kiti itīṭpratiṣedhaḥ siddha iti śvigrahaṇaṁ na kuryāt |
2946:3087: ekāca upadeśe ityata upadeśagrahaṇānuvṛtteḥ śyukaḥ kiti ityanenopadeśa ugantātpratiṣedhaḥ |
2946:3088: śūna ityatra tu nopadeśa ugantatvamapi tu prayoge |
2946:3089: tathā ca śvīdito niṣṭhāyām ityatra rakṣitaḥ |
2946:3090: upadeśagrahaṇānuvṛtteḥ śyukaḥ kiti iti pratiṣedho na prāpnotīti śvigrahaṇamiti |
2946:3092: jñāpakavādino'yamabhiprāyaḥ śyukaḥ kiti ityatropadeśādhikāro na svīkriyate |
2946:3098: taraptamapau ityatra tamapā sāhacaryāllakṣaṇaparibhāṣayā ca pratyayasyaiva tarapo grahaṇāt |
2946:3099: tathopadeśāvasthāyāṁ pakārasyetsañjñālope kṛte guṇaparavelāyāṁ pakārābhāvāttarapsamudāyo nāstīti kathaṁ nadītara ityatra ghasañjñāśañkā |
2946:3107: sarvatraivetsaṁjñāyāṁ lope kṛte bhūtapūrvagatyā pakāramāśritya saṁjñāvidhānāt |
2946:3113: tena śvayitvetyatra samprasāraṇāt pūrvamiḍāgama eva bhavati |
2946:3115: jñāpakaṁ cātra sani grahaguhośca ityatroko'nukarṣaṇārthaṁ cakārakaraṇam |
2946:3116: anyathā rurūṣatīttyatreko jhal iti sanaḥ kittve śyukaḥ kiti ityeveṭpratiṣedhaḥ siddha iti kimuko'nukarṣaṇārthena cakāreṇa,
2946:3117: paśyati tvācāryo'nyatreḍvidhirbalavāniti prathamatastasminkṛte jhalāditvābhāvātkittvaṁ nāstītyuko'nukarṣaṇaṁ karoti ||
2946:3123: satsūddhiṣādi sūtre vidagrahaṇa eṣā na pravarttate |
2946:3124: yujavida ityakārāntasyopādānādgaṇe ye'kārāntā vidadhātavo vida jñāne vida vicāraṇe vida sattāyāmiti te sarve gṛhyante ||
2946:3130: evaṁ tarhi jñāpayatyastīyaṁ paribhāṣā sūṅgrahaṇe lumvikaraṇaparibhāṣayā daivādikasyaiva grahaṇaṁ syāt nādādikasya,
2946:3132: nanu ca sūtiriti śtipā nirddeśaḥ kva cit śtipi pitkāryaṁ na bhavatīti jñāpanārthaḥ |
2946:3133: tena śtipo'pittvān ṅittvena sūti ityatra kṅiti ca iti guṇapratiṣedhaḥ sidhyati |
2946:3134: tathā manyakarmaṇyanādare vibhāṣā ityatra manutergrahaṇaṁ mābhūdityatra manuteriti gaṇābhāvena sidhyati |
2946:3136: sūtisūyatīti vikaraṇanirddeśaḥ pittvābhāvaṁ bodhayanneva paribhāṣāstitvaṁ jñāpayati,
2946:3137: anyathā yadi vikaraṇanirddeśasya pittvābhāvajñāpanameva kevalaṁ prayojanaṁ syāttadā sūtīti nirddeśaṁ kṛtvā sūṅgrahaṇameva kṛtaṁ syāt svaratisūtisūṅdhūṅūdito veti |
2946:3139: atra tu lugvikaraṇālumviraṇayorlumvikaraṇasyaiva grahaṇamiti viparīto'rtho na jñāpyate |
2946:3143: lumvikaraṇaparibhāṣayā raudhādikasya vida vicāraṇe ityasya grahaṇaṁ mābhūditi |
2946:3144: yadi ca lumvikaraṇālumvikaraṇayorlumvikaraṇasyaiva grahaṇamiti syāttadā vida ityapi kṛte vida jñāna ityasyaiva grahaṇaṁ bhaviṣyati kiṁ śtipā nirddeśena |
2946:3146: śīṅo ruṭ ityatra śīṅo'yaṅluggrahaṇena sāhacaryācca yaṅluggrahaṇābhāvasiddheḥ ||
2946:3151: yathā śadeḥ śita ityanena bhāvinā śittvena śīyata ityatrātmanepadam |
2946:3152: tathā ninyaturninyurityatra bhaviṣyadanekāctvena dvirvacanāt prāgevairanekāco'saṁyogapūrvasya iti yaṇādeśaḥ anyatheyaṅ syāt ||
2946:3154: taddhi liṭi dvirvacanasyāvaśyakatvānna kaścidekājastīti bhaviṣyadabhyāsalopapravṛtteruttarakālaṁ bhāvī ya ekāctadarthaṁ kṛtam |
2946:3155: tadarthatā ca tadā syādyadi vartsyatpravṛttyeha kāryāṇi syuḥ |
2946:3159: dvirvacanātprāk sarve dhātava ekāca evetyekājgrahaṇamanarthakaṁ syāt |
2946:3161: svādau cirijirī paṭhyete pratyayāntāśca ye'nekāco dhātavastannivṛttyarthatvāt |
2946:3172: vācya urṇorṇuvadbhāva iti ṇuvadbhāvātideśenorṇoterekāckāryeṇa bhāvyameveti jñāpakameva |
2946:3173: dvirvacane kṛte yadaikāctvaṁ bhavati tadaiva tadarthatvāt |
2946:3176: ghasibhasorhali ca iti lopātprāk paratvādekāca ityanenaivātreḍāgamena bhavitavyam |
2946:3177: tatra hi kṛte gamahanajanakhanaghasām ityupadhālopasya dvirvacane'ci iti sthānivadbhāvātsiddhañjakṣivāniti |
2946:3181: sa ceṭ dvirvacanātprāg yadi kriyate tadā paratvanyāyo na laṅghito bhavati |
2946:3182: tathā ca vasvekājāt iti sūtre rakṣitaḥ,
2946:3185: atha vā'na upadhālopino'nyatarasyām iti bhaviṣyadupadhālopino ṅībvīdhānaṁ jñāpakam |
2946:3186: anyathā sati ṅīpyupadhālopaḥ satyupadhālope ca ṅībityasaṅgatiḥ syāt |
2946:3188: yāvatā saṁyoge guru iti gurusaṁjñābādhanālladhūpadhaguṇo na prāpnoti |
2946:3190: vihitaviśeṣaṇasvīkāre laghūpadhādvihitaṁ yatsārvadhātukamārddhadhātukaṁ vā tasmin guṇa ityadoṣaḥ |
2946:3194: evaṁ tarhi nābhyastasyāci piti sārvadhātuka ityatrājgrahaṇātsaṁyoge guṇo bhaviṣyati |
2946:3198: evaṁ tarhi prakṛtipratyayayorhalorāntarye gurusaṁjñā na bhavati |
2946:3203: yadyevaṁ dṛḍhaḥ sthūlabalayoḥ ityatra tarhi nyāse yaduktaṁ tadasaṁgatam |
2946:3206: yāvatā ho ḍhaḥ iti ḍhatve kṛte ḍho ḍhe lopa ityevaṁ siddhaṁ dṛḍha iti |
2946:3209: ra ṛto halāderlaghoḥ iti karttavye ḍhalopasyāsiddhatvād gurusaṁjñayā laghusaṁjñābādhanāt |
2946:3211: evaṁ manyate guṇa eva karttavye gurusaṁjñā na pravarttate |
2946:3213: tathā ca kḷptaśikha ityatra guroranṛto'nantyasyāpyekaikasya prācām iti gurutvāt pluto bhavatyeva |
2946:3220: tarhyevammanyate draḍhīyānityatra jñāpakasiddhaṁ na sarvatreti laghusaṁjñayā na bhavitavyam |
2946:3222: atha vā yatra pratyaye prakṛtihalā saṁyogastasminneva pratyaye yadi laghusaṁjñākāryaprāptistadaiva knusanoḥ kittvāj jñāpakād gurusaṁjñā na bhavati jñāpakasya tulyatvāt |
2946:3224: apākṣīdityatrāpi sici vṛddhiprāptiḥ parasmaipadagrahaṇaṁ tu sico viśeṣaṇam |
2946:3225: draḍhayati draḍīyānityatra tu ṇāvīyasuni ca rephādeśo na tu kte |
2946:3226: kḷptaśikha ityatrāpi na ktāśrayaḥ pluto'pi tu prakṛtipratyayasaṁyogāśrayaḥ,
2946:3231: tena bhettetyādau satyapi gurutve laghvāśrayo bhavatyeva guṇaḥ kḷptaśikha ityatrāpi gurusaṁjñāśrayaḥ plutaḥ |
2946:3233: ra ṛto halāderlaghoḥ ityanena tu kumbhīdhānyanyāyena laghusaṁjñakasyaiva ṛkārasya rephādeśa ityāśaṅkānirāsārthaṁ hakāralopanipātanaṁ nyāsakṛtoktam |
2946:3235: anyathā ḍhalopasyāsiddhatvādgurusaṁjñako'yamṛkāro na ta laghusaṁjñaka eveti rephādeśo na syāt ||
2946:3239: antaraṅgānapi numādīn bādhitvā bahiraṅgo lugeva pravarttate |
2946:3241: gomānivācarati gomatyate ityatra supo luki kṛte sarvanāmasthānābhāvānnumna pravarttate |
2946:3244: iyaṁ paribhāṣā pratyayottarapadayośca ityatra bhāṣya kāreṇa jñāpitā |
2946:3246: tavāyaṁ tvadīyo mamāyaṁ madīya ityādau chapratyaye tava putrastvatputrī mama putrī matputra ityādau cottarapade vibhaktyāśrayatvāttvamāvekavacana ityanenaiva tvamau bhaviṣyataḥ |
2946:3247: samāsottarakālabhāvī lug bahiraṅgaḥ sa paścād bhaviṣyati |
2946:3250: siddhau pūrveṇa tvamāviti kiṁ pratyayottarapadayośca ityanena tadetkṛtaṁ jñāpayati |
2946:3252: tena tvamau bādhitvā vibhaktiluki kṛte vibhaktyābhāvātpūrveṇa tvamau na prāpnuta iti vacanamarthavadbhavati |
2946:3253: nanu tvattaro mattara iti tarapi tvamau yathā syātāmiti pratyayagrahaṇaṁ syāt prātipadikamātrādeva tarabādayaḥ svārthikā vidhīyante na tu subantāt samarthādhikāranivṛtteḥ |
2946:3254: tathā ca samarthānāṁ prathamāddhā ityatra vyākhyātaṁ svārthikapratyayāvadhiścāyamadhikāra iti |
2946:3256: tava putrastvatputrastubhyaṁ hitaṁ tvaddhitamityatra tavamamau ṅasi tubhyamahyau ṅayi iti bādhitvā tvamau yathā syātām |
2946:3257: anyathā yathā tava tubhyamityatra tavabubhyau bhavatastathātrāpi syātām pratyayottarapadayośca iti sūtre tu kṛte tayorapavādau tvamāveva kriyete iti kathaṁ jñāpakam |
2946:3260: yataḥ svārthikā api nivṛtte'pi samarthādhikāre'ntaraṅgatvāt supi kṛte suvantādeva bhavantīti vyavasthitam |
2946:3261: tathā ca kutsita ityatra sūtre bhāṣyam |
2946:3262: svārthamabhidhāya śabdo nirapekṣo dravyamāha tatsamavetaṁ samavetasya ca liṅgaṁ saṁkhyāṁ vibhaktiścābhidhāya tataḥ priyakutsanādiṣu varttate'sau vibhaktyanta iti |
2946:3263: tasmātsubantasyaiva priyakutsanādayo'rthā viśeṣamiti subantādeva tarabādaya iti yuktamuktaṁ pratyayagrahaṇaṁ jñāpakamiti |
2946:3264: ye tu manyante tarabādiprakṛtestarabādividhau ṅyāpprātipadikasyaiva svabhāvataḥ puruṣādyathāvṛttitvamityanavakāśatvāt supaṁ bādhitvā prātipadikādeva tarabādibhirbhavitavyamiti tamate naiva tarabādividhau ṅyāpprātipadikādityanuvarttate iti vṛttāvuktam |
2946:3265: tathā svādiṣvasarvanāmasthāna ityatra rājataro rājatama ityudāhṛtam |
2946:3269: tathāhi yadi tavatubhyādeśaṁ bādhitvā pratyayottarapadayoścetyanena bhavitavyaṁ tadotsargasamānatvādapavādānām maparyantasyaiva tau bhaviṣyato na sarvasyeti kiṁ maparyantasyetyanukarṣaṇārthena cakāreṇeti |
2946:3271: tadā cakāreṇa maparyantasyetyanukarṣaṇaṁ yatkṛtaṁ tadanarthakaṁ syāt |
2946:3282: tathā tvāṣṭro jāgata ityatrādyajvddhyā aco ṅiti ityasyāta upadhāyā ityasya ca bādhanam ||
2946:3284: yathā brāhmaṇebhyo dadhi dīyatāṁ takraṁ kauṇḍinyāyeti |
2946:3286: anyathā hi bhinnaviṣayatvādādyajvṛddhyopadhāvṛrddhirnna bādhitavyeti siddhaṁ pauṣkarasādirityanartha pāṭho bhavet |
2946:3287: nanu puṣkarasadā jitamityatrārthe tena dīvyati khanati iti ṭhaki kṛte pauṣkarasādika ityatra ṭhaki vṛddhyarthaḥ pāṭhaḥ syāt kiti hyupadhāvṛddhirnāsti ñṇiti tadvidhānāt |
2946:3290: ke cittu vibhāṣā supo gahuc purastāt ityatra vibhāṣāgrahaṇaṁ jñāpakamāhuḥ |
2946:3292: yato vibhāṣāgrahaṇaṁ kalpavādīnāṁ pakṣe vidhānārthaṁ vṛttau vyākhyātam |
2946:3293: anyathā hyasati vibhāṣāgrahaṇe nityameva bahuci sati kalpabādayo na syuḥ |
2946:3296: yato bahuci kṛte tenaiveṣadasamāptyarthasya dyotitatvādabhihite'bhidhānaṁ nāsti kimpunardyotite dyotanamiti kalpabādayo na prapnuvantyeva |
2946:3298: na hyavaśyaṁ deśakṛta eva sāmānyaviśeṣarvirodho bhavati |
2946:3299: kiṁ tvarthakṛto'pi bahucaḥ kalpabādibhiḥ samāno'rtha iti bahucā dyotitatvādabhihite punarabhidhānaṁ nāsti |
2946:3310: jñāpakaṁ cātra pravāhaṇasya ḍhe ityanena pravāhaṇasyāpatyaṁ prāvāhaṇeya iti śubhrāditvāḍ ḍhaki uttarapadavṛddhividhānam |
2946:3311: tatra pūrvapadasya praśabdasya vibhāṣottarapadasya tu vāhanasya dīrghasyāpyākārasya nityaṁ vṛddhiḥ |
2946:3313: pravāhaṇeyībhārya ityatra vṛddhinimittasya ca taddhitasyāraktavikāre iti puṁvadbhāvapratiṣedhaḥ prayojanamiti cet |
2946:3316: jātitvaṁ cāsya gotraṁ ca caraṇaiḥ saheti |
2946:3317: jāteśca ityatra svāṅgāccetyato'māninītyanuvṛttermānini puṁvadbhāvaniṣedho nāṣti pravāhaṇeyamāninī |
2946:3318: tataścātra na vṛddhinimittasya iti puṁvadbhāvapratiṣedhārthaṁ vṛddhividhānadamiti |
2946:3319: yadyevaṁ kathaṁ tatra tarhi nyāsakṛtā vyākhyātaṁ jāteśca iti puṁvadbhāvapratiṣedhe siddhe vṛddhinimittasya iti puṁvadbhāvapratiṣedhārthaṁ pravāhaṇasya ṭha iti vṛddhividhānaṁ jāteśca ityasyānityatvaṁ jñāpayati,
2946:3320: tena hāstikamityatra jāteśca iti paṁvadbhāvapratiṣedho na bhavatīti |
2946:3326: yathā madhye garbhastathāḥ strīpratyayāḥ prātipadikasvādyormmadhye bhavanti |
2946:3327: kā ke kā iti kādeśe kṛte ṭabbhavati |
2946:3328: ādigrahaṇādarvaṇastrasāvanaña iti vibhaktau cādeśe kṛte ugitaśca iti ṅīp |
2946:3330: kroṣṭuśabdādvibhaktau striyāṁ ca iti tṛjvadbhāve kroṣṭrībhyāṁ kroṣṭībhirityinye ||
2946:3331: jñāpakaṁ cātra na yāsayoḥ itīttvapratiṣedhārthaṁ vacanam |
2946:3333: tyadādyatve kṛte garbhavaṭṭāpo'bhāvāt yakā saketi na syāt |
2946:3334: evaṁ ca pratyayasthāt itīttvaprāpterabhāvānna yāsayoḥ ityanarthakaṁ syāt |
2946:3337: yadi na garbhavaṭṭāp syāttadā tyadādyatve kṛte supaḥ pareṇa syād yakā saketi na syāt |
2946:3338: evaṁ ca pratyayasthāt itīttvaprāpterabhāvānna yāsayoḥ ityanarthakaṁ syāt |
2946:3341: yadi na garbhavaṭṭāp syāttadā tyadādyatve kṛte supaḥ pareṇa syād yakā saketyatra pratyayasthāt itīttvaprāptireva nāsti supaḥ paratvādāpaḥ |
2946:3346: tena kṅiti ca ityatra kṅitītyasya guṇavṛddhibhyāṁ sambandhāttasminniti nirdiṣṭa iti paribhāṣā nopatiṣṭhate |
2946:3347: tena kaṅinnimitte pratyaye niṣedhādbhinnamityatrāpi niṣedhaḥ siddhyati ||
2946:3355: nanvevaṁ saṁkhyāvyayābhyāmuttara ūdhaḥśabdānto yo bahuvrīhiriti syāttataścehaiva syāt pañcaghaṭoghṇaḥ |
2946:3361: nanvevamapi tripade bahuvrīhau na prāpnoti tadarthaṁ yatna āstheyaḥ ||
2946:3365: tena heracaṅi iti hinoterṇyantādapi sani kṛte |
2946:3367: abhiṣāvayati pariṣāvayatītyatra tu sunotimeva prati kriyāyogo na tu sāvayatiṁ pratītyupasargātsunoti iti ṣatvamiti vṛttavuktaṁ na tvanayā paribhāṣayeti ||
2946:3369: yadi prakṛtigrahaṇe ṇyadhikasya grahaṇaṁ na syāt |
2946:3370: tadā kevalasya hinoteraṅgasyābhysanimittapratyaye kutvamucyamānaṁ kaḥ prasaṅgo ṇyadhike syāt |
2946:3373: na bhādi sūtre ṇyantānāṁ bhādīnāmupasaṁkhyānamiti vacanāt |
2946:3374: tenārha ityatra ṇyantasyārhatergrahaṇaṁ na bhavatīti rakṣitenoktam ||
2946:3378: aṅgakāryasya vṛttiḥ pravṛttiraṅgavṛttistato hetornniṣṭhitasya prayogārhasyāṅgasya punaraṅgakāryapravṛttāvavidhiravidhānaṁ bhavati |
2946:3381: tena pibatītyatra pibādeśe kṛte laghūpadhaguṇo na bhavat ||
2946:3382: iyaṁ ca paribhāṣā bhāṣye jñājanorjjā ityatra jyādādīyasa ityatra ca jñāpitā |
2946:3384: kimarthaṁ jābhāvo vidhīyate na jabhāva eva vidhīyatām |
2946:3385: tatrāpyato dīrgho yañi ityanena siddhyatyeva jāyata iti |
2946:3386: uttaratrāpyuktaṁ jyātparasyeyasaḥ pratyayasyā''ttvaṁ kimarthamucyate na prakṛto lopa eva vidhīyatām |
2946:3388: tasmārpūrvatra jābhāva itaratra tvākāravidhānamubhayamapi jñāpakamastīyaṁ paribhāṣeti |
2946:3390: pratipattilāghavārthaṁ dīrghāntādeśavidhānaṁ hrasve'pi hi kṛte'to dīrgho yañi ityevaṁ jānātīti siddhyati |
2946:3394: na hi ja ityādeśe kṛte niṣṭhitamaṅgaṁ bhavati |
2946:3404: tena papaktiryā yaṣṭirityatra pūrvatrāsiddhādhikārīye kutve ṣatve ca karttavye'to lopasyāsthānivattvājjhalādau kutvaṁ ṣatvaṁ ca siddhyati |
2946:3405: nanu pāpaktiryā yaṣṭirityatra yaṅoci ca iti hyajjhalsamudāyasya lope kṛte halacorādeśe na sthānivaditi siddham |
2946:3407: ato lopa ityakāralope kṛte yaṅo'ci ca iti yakāramātrameva lupyate |
2946:3409: na padāntādi sūtre yāyāvara ityatra sthānivadbhāvapratiṣedhārthādvaregrahaṇāt |
2946:3412: yaṅo'kārasya sthānivattvena loluvaḥ popuva ityādeḥ siddhatvāt |
2946:3413: evaṁ tarhi na dhātulopa sūtrasāmarthyādaci pratyaye lopaḥ samudāyasyaiva kriyata iti jñāpyate |
2946:3414: anyatra tu pratyekaṁ tena sanīsraṁsa ityādi siddhyat |
2946:3416: yadyeva niṣṭhā śīṅ ityatra yannyāsakṛtīktaṁ śīṅo ṅitkaraṇasya prayojanaṁ yaṅluki kittvapratiṣedho mā bhūccheśyitaḥ śeśyitavāniti |
2946:3419: evaṁ tarhyārddhadhātuka ityasya viṣayasaptamītvamāśritya tatra vyākhyātam |
2946:3420: yadi cāci lopaḥ samastasyaivānyatra tu niyamo nāṣtīti vākyārthaḥ |
2946:3422: ato yadā samudāyalopastadhā śeśyita ityatrākittvapratiṣedhārthaṁ ṅitkaraṇamiti nyāsakārasyābhiprāyaḥ ||
2946:3423: iyaṁ ca paribhāṣā nāglopiśāsvṛditām ityatra bhāṣye jñāpitā |
2946:3424: tatra hyuktamacakathadityādāvajādeśasya sthānivattvādeva ṇau hrasvo na bhaviṣyati kimaglopināṁ neti pratiṣedhena tata uktaṁ yatra sthānivadbhāvo nāsti tadarthamatyararājaditi na hyatra ṭilopo'jādeśaḥ kiṁ tarhi halacorādeśa iti tataḥ punaruktaṁ na tarhyaglopināṁ neti pratiṣedho'tra prāptoti na hyatrāgeva lupyate kiṁ tarhyanyo'pi atha yo'trāglupyate tadāśrayo niṣedhaḥ eva tarhi yo'j lupyate tadāśrayaḥ sthānivadbhāvo'pi bhaviṣyatītyutkvopasaṁhṛtam |
2946:3425: evaṁ tarhi yadaglopināṁ neti pratiṣedhaṁ śāsti tato jñāpayatyācārya iti ārabhyottaratra sthānivadbhāvo na bhavatīti tena pūrvatrāsiddhīye na sthānivaditi vaktavyanna bhavatīti |
2946:3430: yadi hi syāttadā sthūlādīnāṁ yaṇādilope'vādeśo vaktavyaḥ syāt |
2946:3439: halacorādeśe na sthānivadityasminnasati samudāyasya sthānivattvādavādeśo na syāt |
2946:3443: yathātra yo hyubhayoḥ sthāne sampadyata iti vacanādajjhalādeśasyāpyajādeśavyapadeśastathānajādeśavyapadeśo'pyasti |
2946:3447: etaccāglope sāmānyajñāpakaṁ tena dṛṣadamākhyadadadṛṣadityatrāganaglope'pyaglopa iti pratiṣedhāddīrgho laghoḥ iti na bhavati |
2946:3450: na cedaṁ sthānivadbhāvena siddhyati dīrghavidhau tanniṣedhāt ||
2946:3460: yatra parāśrito vidhiryathā vṛkṣādityatra supaḥ paragrahaṇāt suptvātpadatvaṁ kuṭādītyatra na paragrahaṇāśritaṁ jaśtvam |
2946:3465: yadyapi jaśtvasyākāro nimittaṁ na bhavati tathāpi paragrahaṇe sati kuḍiti ṭakārāntaṁ padaṁ bhavatīti jaśtvasya paragrahaṇameva nimittam |
2946:3472: anyathā hi vṛkṣamityatrāpyekādeśasya pūrvagrahaṇemakārasyakadeśavikāradvāreṇa suptve supi ca iti dīrghaḥ syādeva |
2946:3473: evaṁ cobhayata āśraye nāntādivaditi vyarthaṁ syāt |
2946:3476: kuṭādītyatra na jaśtvaṁ paramākāramāśrayatīti yuktamekadeśavikāriṇaṣṭakārasya padāntatvamiti |
2946:3477: nanu tathāpyatra padāntavidhau jaśtve karttavye padāntavidhiṁ prati na sthānivaditisthānivattvapratiṣedhājjaśtvena bhavitavyameva |
2946:3479: sati sthānivattvaniṣedhe padāntatvaṁ sati ca padāntatve sthānivattvaniṣedha itītaretarāśrayatvam |
2946:3480: evamapi jhalāṁ jaśo'nta iti jaśtvamastyeva na cāsti sthānivattvaṁ jaśtvavidhiṁ prati na sthānivaditi tanniṣedhāt |
2946:3482: rephāpādīye carsahacarite jhalāṁ jaśtve karttavye sthānivattvapratiṣedha iṣyate |
2946:3484: etacca ṭhājādāvṛddhvaṁ dvitīyādaca ityatra ṣāḍikaprastāve rakṣitenoktam ||
2946:3489: tena dadhatītyatropajātanimitto'pyantaraṅo jho'nta ityantādeśa upajaniṣyamāṇanimittenādabhyastāt ityadādeśena bādhyate ||
2946:3490: jñāpakaṁ cātra śīṅaḥ sārvadhātuke guṇa ityatraikāre vidhātavye guṇagrahaṇam |
2946:3491: tasyaitatprayojanaṁ guṇaśrutyekaparibhāṣopasthānādika eva sthāne guṇo yathā syāditi |
2946:3492: anyathā śete ityatra ṅakārasyetsaṁjñāṁ bādhitvaikāraḥ syāt tatra yadyantaraṅgastadā guṇagrahaṇamanarthakaṁ ṅakāre lupte'nyathaivekārasyaikārādeśaprasaṅgāt |
2946:3493: ata eva śīṅaḥ sārvadhātuke guṇa ityapanīya sārvadhātukamapidaśīṅa iti na kṛtam |
2946:3494: na caivamadhiśayyete ityatra ṅittvapratiṣedhādāto ṅita itīyādeśo na syāditi vācyam |
2946:3495: yato'śīṅa iti pañcamīnirddeśācchīṅga uttarasya pratiṣedhena bhavitavyam |
2946:3496: na cāśīṅga iti paryudāsācca sādṛśyenājantatvāccāco ṅittvena bhavitavyam |
2946:3498: atha vā na śīṅa iti pṛthageva kriyāmiti |
2946:3500: upajātanimitto'pyutsarga upajaniṣyamāṇanimittenāpavādena bādhyata ityatrārthe ṛcchatṝtāmityatra ṛkārapraśleṣo rakṣitena jñāpaka uktaḥ |
2946:3501: yadyeṣā na syāt ṛ atusiti sthite iko re yaṇādeśe kṛte sthānivadbhāvād dvirvacane kṛte'ta ādeḥ iti dīghatvena siddhamāraturāruriti |
2946:3504: savarṇadīrghatve ca kṛte prakṛtigrahaṇena grahaṇādraturiti syāt |
2946:3505: abhyāsagrahaṇapakṣe rephalopo āto lopa iṭi ca ityākāralope cāturiti syāt |
2946:3508: yadi tu vyāśraye vārṇādāṅga balīya iti syāt tadā savarṇadīrghatvambādhitvoradattvādikaṁ syāt |
2946:3510: atha vā ṛgrahaṇaṁ tatra pratyākhyātaṁ yata iti ||
2946:3514: ṇau parato yad vṛddhyādikaṁ kṛtaṁ tad dvirvacane karttavye sthānivatsyāt |
2946:3516: aśūśavadityatra tu vakārasya saṁprasāraṇaṁ ṇau kṛtamapi dvirvacane na sthānivadbhavati |
2946:3519: jñāpakaṁ cātra oḥ puyaṇjyapara ityatrābhyāsaviśeṣaṇamoriti padam |
2946:3520: tena hi pavarge yaṇi jakāre cā'cpare'bhyāsasyetvaṁ vidhīyate bibhāvayiṣatītyādiṣu,
2946:3521: yadi ca ṇau kṛtaṁ vṛddhyāvādeśādikāryaṁ sthānivanna syātkathamabhyāsasyokāretvaṁ vidhīyate |
2946:3522: tulyajātīyatvājjhāpakasyāparāṇāṁ puyuṇjāṁ sadṛśā anye'varṇaparā eva sthānivattvaṁ bhajante |
2946:3525: stautiṇyoreva ṣaṇyabhyāsāt ityatra siṣedhayiṣatītyudāharaṇa ekārapare'nayā sthānivattvaṁ kṛtvā dvirvacanasya pratipāditatvāt |
2946:3526: tathaujaḍhadityatrānayā sthānivattvena dvirvacanamuktamayuktaṁ syāt tathā lopaḥ pivaterīccābhyāsasya ityatrāpīpyadityatra ṇau kṛtaṁ sthānivadbhavatīti vṛttikṛdvacanaṁ vyāhataṁ syāt |
2946:3534: tacca ṇau ca saṁścaṅoḥ ityatra rakṣitena vyākhyātam |
2946:3540: tena mīmāṁsata ityatra mānvadhādinā dīrgheṇa sanyataḥ itīttvaṁ na bādhyate |
2946:3541: tathā'cikṣaṇadityatra sāvakāśaṁ sanyata itīttvamacīkaradityādau dīgho laghoḥ ityanena na bādhyate ||
2946:3543: taddhi grayamyata ityādau dīrgho mā bhūdityevamarthaṁ kriyate |
2946:3544: yadi cābhyāsavikāreṣvapi bādhyabādhakabhāvaḥ syāttadā nugāgame kṛte'najantatvādeva dīrgho na bhaviṣyati kimakidgrahaṇena tat kṛtamuktārthasya jñāpakamiti ||
2946:3552: dvirvacane karttavye pūrvatrāsiddham iti na pravarttate |
2946:3553: tena drogdhādogdhā droḍhādroḍhetyatra druherjhali ghatvaḍhatvayoḥ kṛtayoḥ sarvasya dve iti dvirvacanaṁ bhavati |
2946:3554: anyathā pūrvatrāsiddham ityasiddhatvād droh tetyasya dvirvacanaṁ syāt |
2946:3556: tatraitanna labhyate yadā prakṛterghatvaṁ tadā dviruktasyāpīti |
2946:3559: nanvasiddhapādaṁ paṭhitvā sarvasya dvepādaḥ paṭhyatāṁ tato'siddhatvaṁ na bhaviṣyati |
2946:3561: evaṁ hi paṭhatipaṭhatitarāmityatra prakarṣapratyayātparatvena dvirvacanaṁ na syāt |
2946:3562: pūvatrāsiddhīye nāsti paratvamabhāvāduttarasyetivacanādgrāmastvekṣata ityatra ca tvāmau dvitīyāyā ityasyāsiddhatvāḍhādguṇo na syāt ||
2946:3563: jñāpakaṁ cātra sarvasya dve ityatra sarvasyeti vacanam |
2946:3566: sarvakāryayuktasya dvirvacanaṁ sarvakāryaṁ kṛtvā dvirvacanaṁ bhavatītyarthaḥ |
2946:3567: evaṁ ca tadupapadyate yadyasiddhatvanna bhavatīti jñāpakam |
2946:3576: na ca dvāvikārau kṛtaikādeśāvādeśatvaṁ pratipadyete ityekāltvādādeśo'ntyasya syāt |
2946:3579: aco'rddhamātre tarhi prāpnutaḥ pariśabdasyārddhamātre dve vidhīyamāne'lgrahaṇena cārddhamātrāyā agrahaṇādanekāltvābhe'sati sarvasyeti vacane'ntyasya prāpnuta iti |
2946:3583: sarvasya dve ityatra sūtre kātyāyanavākyamidaṁ paribhāṣārūpeṇa paṭhyate |
2946:3595: jñāpakaṁ cātrāni loṭ ityatrānītyāgamasahitasya nergrahaṇaṁ nitye hyāgamaśāsana āṭa upādānamakṛtvā niloṭ ityevaṁ kuryāt |
2946:3596: tathā yuvoranākau ityatra nyāse ghorlopo leṭi vā iti vāgrahaṇena jñāpitā |
2946:3597: ke cittu stoḥ ścunā ścuḥ ityakṛtanumāgamanirddeśaṁ jñāpakamāhuḥ |
2946:3599: yāvatā'mi pūrva ityekādeśasya paragrahaṇena grahaṇādantarvarttinīṁ vibhaktimāśritya padatvānnalopena bhavitavyam |
2946:3602: na cātra padāntavidhiṁ prati na sthānivadityasti,
2946:3604: sati sthānivattvapratiṣedhe padāntatvaṁ sati ca padāntatve sthānivattvapratiṣedha iti |
2946:3605: nanvevamapi pūrvatrāsiddhīye na sthānivaditi sthānivattvaṁ na prāpnoti |
2946:3607: uttarapadatve cāpadādividhāvityuttarasya padatve karttavye pratyayalakṣaṇapratiṣedhācchāsanasya padatvaṁ nāstīti kuto nalopaḥ |
2946:3608: yadevaṁ ṣātpadāntāt ityatra vṛttau yadvākhyātaṁ pade'ntaḥ padānta iti saptamīsamāso'yaṁ teneha na bhavati susarpiṣkeṇa suyajuṣkeṇeti tadasaṅgatam |
2946:3610: yathā susarpiṣkeṇetyatra kapratyaye'pade parataḥ ṣakārāntantathaivāpadāntatvaṁ ṣantasya |
2946:3612: padādividhiśabdena sātpadādyoḥ ityārabhya ye vidyayaste gṛhyante |
2946:3620: nanu yadyevamarthaṁ padāntagrahaṇaṁ tadā tadakṛtvā ṣātsupītyevaṁ kriyatām |
2946:3622: ayaṁ cārthaḥ subante parato yaḥ ṣakāraḥ pade parata iti etadevamuktārthasya jñāpakaṁ bhaviṣyati |
2946:3632: yata evaṁvidhajñāpane druṇaso vārddhrīṇas ityādāvuttarasya naḥśabdasya padāntatvātpūrvapadātsaṁjñāyāmaga iti ṇatvaṁ bhavati carmanāsike ṇatvābhāvaḥ |
2946:3634: tathā māṣakumbhavāpeneti samāsa uttarasya kumbhaśabdasya padatvaṁ bhavati |
2946:3640: nanu yadi sātpadādyoḥ ityārabhya kārye'padādividhāvitivacanāduttarasya padatvaṁ bhavati |
2946:3641: tarhi bhāvakarmaṇoḥ ityādau padāntasya iti karttavye ṇatvapratiṣedhe padatvaṁ prāpnoti tataśca padāntasya iti ṇatvapratiṣedhena bhavitavyam |
2946:3649: tena tadantavidhinā divaśabdāntapadasyottvamiti siddhaṁ vimaladyu dinamiti |
2946:3661: jñāpakaṁ cāsyā udaḥ sthāstambhoḥ pūrvasya ityādau ṣakāranivṛttau ṭhasya thakāroccāraṇam |
2946:3663: loke hi japākusumasannidhau sphaṭike rāgastanivṛttau nivarttate,
2946:3666: tathā abhūnnipa ityādau padasaṁskāre bhūtasāmānye luṅanadyatanāvagamavelāyāṁ na nivarttate |
2946:3667: etasmin pāde upasargādasamāse'pi ṇopadeśasya ityatra sthāne dvirvacanapakṣe'pi śrutyabhedāttattvādhyavasāyena kāryāṇi pravattanta iti sopadeśānāṁ sicprabhṛtīnāṁ pāṭhena sico yaṅi itipratiṣedhārthenetyādiphakkikāyāṁ dūṣaṇaṁ samādhanaṁ caikācpāde saṁprasāraṇabhāṣāyāmuktam ||
